engChrName: Okay, this labyrinth is WAY bigger than I expected.
engSearchText: Okay, this labyrinth is WAY bigger than I expected.
jpnChrName: オラシオンの地下遺構…… かなりの空間が広がってるみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンの地下遺構……
かなりの空間が広がってるみたいです。

engChrName: For real. And this is just the upper floor...
engSearchText: For real. And this is just the upper floor...
jpnChrName: ええ、さっき“上層”とか言ってたし。
jpnSearchText: ええ、さっき“上層”とか言ってたし。

engChrName: I surmise this place was once an underground waterway—likely constructed during the Dark and Middle Ages.
engSearchText:
I surmise this place was once an underground
waterway—likely constructed during the Dark and
Middle Ages.
jpnChrName: どうやら暗黒時代から中世にかけて 建造された地下水路のようですが……
jpnSearchText:
どうやら暗黒時代から中世にかけて
建造された地下水路のようですが……

engChrName: It might've been used as an escape route from the palace back then.
engSearchText:
It might've been used as an escape route from the
palace back then.
jpnChrName: ……多分、王宮からの脱出路としても 使われていたんじゃないかと思います。
jpnSearchText:
……多分、王宮からの脱出路としても
使われていたんじゃないかと思います。

engChrName: Yeah, probably.
engSearchText: Yeah, probably.
jpnChrName: ハン、いかにもありそうだな。
jpnSearchText: ハン、いかにもありそうだな。

engChrName: All of the players have now entered through their designated doors. Very good.
engSearchText:
All of the players have now entered through their
designated doors. Very good.
jpnChrName: さて──そろそろ全員、 ゲームの“領域”に入ったようだな？
jpnSearchText:
さて──そろそろ全員、
ゲームの“領域”に入ったようだな？

engChrName: Dantès!
engSearchText: Dantès!
jpnChrName: ジェラール……！
jpnSearchText: ジェラール……！

engChrName: He's using a projection.
engSearchText: He's using a projection.
jpnChrName: あ、あの映像は……
jpnSearchText: あ、あの映像は……

engChrName: Indeed. And a shard-based one, by the looks of it.
engSearchText: Indeed. And a shard-based one, by the looks of it.
jpnChrName: シャードを利用した遠隔投影…… ザイファ規格による最新技術ですね。
jpnSearchText:
シャードを利用した遠隔投影……
ザイファ規格による最新技術ですね。

engChrName: I just confirmed that all participating parties have completed the game's registration process.
engSearchText:
I just confirmed that all participating parties have
completed the game's registration process.
jpnChrName: 先ほど、この地に集まった全ての勢力が ゲームへの参加登録を行ったのを確認した。
jpnSearchText:
先ほど、この地に集まった全ての勢力が
ゲームへの参加登録を行ったのを確認した。

engChrName: I would like to extend a warm welcome to each and every team here—all nineteen of you.
engSearchText:
I would like to extend a warm welcome to each and
every team here—all nineteen of you.
jpnChrName: 全１９チーム── 此度の“祭り”の主宰（ホスト）として歓迎しよう。
jpnSearchText:
全１９チーム──
此度の“祭り”の主宰（ホスト）として歓迎しよう。

engChrName: That's a higher number than I expected.
engSearchText: That's a higher number than I expected.
jpnChrName: １９チーム…… 聞いていた勢力数より多くなってますね。
jpnSearchText:
１９チーム……
聞いていた勢力数より多くなってますね。

engChrName: It could be a little inflated. It's possible the jaeger corps split themselves into multiple groups.
engSearchText:
It could be a little inflated. It's possible the jaeger
corps split themselves into multiple groups.
jpnChrName: 多分、人数の多い猟兵団などが 複数チーム出してるのかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
多分、人数の多い猟兵団などが
複数チーム出してるのかもしれません。

engChrName: You are standing in an underground facility that was constructed by the former royal family and tweaked by us for the purpose of this game.
engSearchText:
You are standing in an underground facility that was
constructed by the former royal family and tweaked
by us for the purpose of this game.
jpnChrName: 今、お前たちがいるのは旧王家が築いた 地下遺構に俺たちが細工を施したものだ。
jpnSearchText:
今、お前たちがいるのは旧王家が築いた
地下遺構に俺たちが細工を施したものだ。

engChrName: Before the slaughtering can begin, however, there are a few additional rules we must explain. Care to do the honors, Melchior?
engSearchText:
Before the slaughtering can begin, however, there are
a few additional rules we must explain. Care to do the
honors, Melchior?
jpnChrName: このままゲームを始めるにあたり 幾つか補足説明がある──メルキオル。
jpnSearchText:
このままゲームを始めるにあたり
幾つか補足説明がある──メルキオル。

engChrName: Ooh, with pleasure! Finally, my time to shine has arrived! ❤
engSearchText:
Ooh, with pleasure! Finally, my time to shine
has arrived! ❤
jpnChrName: はいはーい、やっと僕の出番だね❤
jpnSearchText: はいはーい、やっと僕の出番だね❤

engChrName: Welcome to our little game, players! I am positively teeming with anticipation to get this glorious bloodbath underway.
engSearchText:
Welcome to our little game, players! I am positively
teeming with anticipation to get this glorious
bloodbath underway.
jpnChrName: さて、これから君たちには地下で 存分に潰し合ってもらうわけだけど……
jpnSearchText:
さて、これから君たちには地下で
存分に潰し合ってもらうわけだけど……

engChrName: But first, there are a few important details you ought to know.
engSearchText:
But first, there are a few important details you ought
to know.
jpnChrName: 正午に渡した“メインルール”とは別に 細かい決まり事があってね。
jpnSearchText:
正午に渡した“メインルール”とは別に
細かい決まり事があってね。

engChrName: Take a gander at the keycard in your possession.
engSearchText: Take a gander at the keycard in your possession.
jpnChrName: まずはお手元のアクセスキーをご覧あれ♪
jpnSearchText: <C1>まずはお手元のアクセスキーをご覧あれ♪

engChrName: That very card serves as unequivocal proof of your right to partake in our humble little game.
engSearchText:
That very card serves as unequivocal proof of your
right to partake in our humble little game.
jpnChrName: それは“参加資格”にして“挑戦資格”──
jpnSearchText: <C1>それは“参加資格”にして“挑戦資格”──

engChrName: We distributed one card to each team. The key to victory is to steal the other teams' cards...
engSearchText:
We distributed one card to each team. The key to
victory is to steal the other teams' cards...
jpnChrName: 今は各チームが１つずつ持っているそれを、 奪い合いながら領域の奥を目指してもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
今は各チームが１つずつ持っているそれを、
奪い合いながら領域の奥を目指してもらうよ。

engChrName: ...and bring a set number of them to the doors at the end of each zone.
engSearchText:
...and bring a set number of them to the doors at the
end of each zone.
jpnChrName: 最奥への扉を開くには、領域ごとに設定された 規定数以上のアクセスキーを集める必要がある。
jpnSearchText:
最奥への扉を開くには、領域ごとに設定された
規定数以上のアクセスキーを集める必要がある。

engChrName: After that, you will come face to face with the zone's boss. You must defeat them to advance.
engSearchText:
After that, you will come face to face with the
zone's boss. You must defeat them to advance.
jpnChrName: 扉の向こうで待つ“担当者”を倒すことで 次の領域への道が開かれていくって寸法さ。
jpnSearchText:
扉の向こうで待つ“担当者”を倒すことで
次の領域への道が開かれていくって寸法さ。

engChrName: So if you honestly believed you could finish this game without spilling a single drop of blood, then I'm happy to disappoint! ♪
engSearchText:
So if you honestly believed you could finish this game
without spilling a single drop of blood, then I'm
happy to disappoint! ♪
jpnChrName: 何が何でも他の勢力を潰して アクセスキーを手に入れるしかないワケだね♪
jpnSearchText:
何が何でも他の勢力を潰して
アクセスキーを手に入れるしかないワケだね♪

engChrName: When a team inevitably loses, they must hand over all their keycards to the winner and take a bow.
engSearchText:
When a team inevitably loses, they must hand over all
their keycards to the winner and take a bow.
jpnChrName: 負けたチームは勝ったチームに 持っている全てのアクセスキーを渡してもらう。
jpnSearchText:
負けたチームは勝ったチームに
持っている全てのアクセスキーを渡してもらう。

engChrName: They cannot advance, nor can they interfere with the remaining players inside the game area.
engSearchText:
They cannot advance, nor can they interfere with the
remaining players inside the game area.
jpnChrName: そうなればゲームは脱落（リタイア）──それ以上の攻略も、 領域内で他の参加者に干渉する事も基本許されなくなる。
jpnSearchText:
そうなればゲームは脱落（リタイア）──それ以上の攻略も、
領域内で他の参加者に干渉する事も基本許されなくなる。

engChrName: Oh, and don't even think about fleeing the city. Heavens, no. You will all tremble in fear until the very last day of the game.
engSearchText:
Oh, and don't even think about fleeing the city.
Heavens, no. You will all tremble in fear until the
very last day of the game.
jpnChrName: あ、だからといって都市からの離脱もＮＧだよ？ 最終日まで何もできず震えてるしかないってわけ♪
jpnSearchText:
あ、だからといって都市からの離脱もＮＧだよ？
最終日まで何もできず震えてるしかないってわけ♪

engChrName: Also, while I cannot force you to kill each other, I will cry if you don't. So for my sake, don't show any mercy.
engSearchText:
Also, while I cannot force you to kill each other, I will
cry if you don't. So for my sake, don't show
any mercy.
jpnChrName: できれば殺し合いの末に奪い合って欲しいかなァ。 目的も違うだろうし、他人に命を委ねたくないよね？
jpnSearchText:
できれば殺し合いの末に奪い合って欲しいかなァ。
目的も違うだろうし、他人に命を委ねたくないよね？

engChrName: I should probably mention the bonus feature we threw in to add a touch of thrill and suspense.
engSearchText:
I should probably mention the bonus feature we
threw in to add a touch of thrill and suspense.
jpnChrName: そうそう、ゲームの緊張感を高めるための 仕掛けもいくつかあってね。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、ゲームの緊張感を高めるための
仕掛けもいくつかあってね。

engChrName: We placed nuclear bombs in each of the underground zones!
engSearchText:
We placed nuclear bombs in each of the
underground zones!
jpnChrName: 王宮跡にある反応兵器とは別に、 地上の各街区に“爆弾”を仕掛けといたよ❤
jpnSearchText:
王宮跡にある反応兵器とは別に、
地上の各街区に“爆弾”を仕掛けといたよ❤

engChrName: They aren't as potent as our palace bomb, but they're at least as strong as a shot from a railway gun.
engSearchText:
They aren't as potent as our palace bomb, but they're
at least as strong as a shot from a railway gun.
jpnChrName: 当然、反応兵器ほどじゃないけど 列車砲級の破壊力のある火薬式でね♪
jpnSearchText:
当然、反応兵器ほどじゃないけど
列車砲級の破壊力のある火薬式でね♪

engChrName: If you let even one of them go off, a few thousand people will soon be knocking on Aidios' door.
engSearchText:
If you let even one of them go off, a few thousand
people will soon be knocking on Aidios' door.
jpnChrName: 一発で数千人規模が女神行き── 簡単には見つからない場所に隠してある。
jpnSearchText:
一発で数千人規模が女神行き──
簡単には見つからない場所に隠してある。

engChrName: The bombs are hidden, so you'll have to defeat the zone boss to disable their activation switch. There's a time limit in play, so no dilly-dallying!
engSearchText:
The bombs are hidden, so you'll have to defeat the
zone boss to disable their activation switch. There's a
time limit in play, so no dilly-dallying!
jpnChrName: 起爆装置は各階層の担当者が管理していて、 タイムリミットも設定されてるから気を付けて。
jpnSearchText:
起爆装置は各階層の担当者が管理していて、
タイムリミットも設定されてるから気を付けて。

engChrName: If you focus solely on disabling the palace bomb, you may find that Oración will be short of a few districts at the end of the game.
engSearchText:
If you focus solely on disabling the palace bomb, you
may find that Oración will be short of a few districts
at the end of the game.
jpnChrName: ３日の期限を待たずに、どこかの街区が なくなっちゃうかもしれないからね？
jpnSearchText:
３日の期限を待たずに、どこかの街区が
なくなっちゃうかもしれないからね？

engChrName: Now, I know that was a lot for your tiny little brains to process, but I do hope you at least got the gist of it.
engSearchText:
Now, I know that was a lot for your tiny little brains
to process, but I do hope you at least got the gist of it.
jpnChrName: さあ、一気に話しちゃったけど 大体のルールはこれで伝えられたかな？
jpnSearchText:
さあ、一気に話しちゃったけど
大体のルールはこれで伝えられたかな？

engChrName: We'll be keeping a watchful eye on all of you. We can't have you breaking any rules, now, can we? So try to be on your best behavior!
engSearchText:
We'll be keeping a watchful eye on all of you. We
can't have you breaking any rules, now, can we?
So try to be on your best behavior!
jpnChrName: これらのルールも監視対象だから くれぐれも破らないように気を付けて。
jpnSearchText:
これらのルールも監視対象だから
くれぐれも破らないように気を付けて。

engChrName: All righty, then! Now that the ground rules have been laid bare, we can finally start the murdering!
engSearchText:
All righty, then! Now that the ground rules have been
laid bare, we can finally start the murdering!
jpnChrName: ──それじゃあ、只今をもってゲームの “第一フェーズ”のスタートを宣言するよ。
jpnSearchText:
──それじゃあ、只今をもってゲームの
“第一フェーズ”のスタートを宣言するよ。

engChrName: For round one, you will need three keycards to proceed to the next zone. The first bomb will go off in exactly three hours.
engSearchText:
For round one, you will need three keycards to
proceed to the next zone. The first bomb will go off
in exactly three hours.
jpnChrName: 上層の攻略条件はアクセスキー３つ以上。 タイムリミットは３時間だ。
jpnSearchText:
上層の攻略条件はアクセスキー３つ以上。
タイムリミットは３時間だ。

engChrName: We spared no expense in preparing this carnival of carnage, so put on a good show! I want to see piles of mutilated corpses! ♪
engSearchText:
We spared no expense in preparing this carnival of
carnage, so put on a good show! I want to see piles of
mutilated corpses! ♪
jpnChrName: 僕たちが丹精込めて準備した謝肉祭（カルナヴァル）── これからの３日間、清く楽しく殺し合おうか♪
jpnSearchText:
僕たちが丹精込めて準備した謝肉祭（カルナヴァル）──
これからの３日間、清く楽しく殺し合おうか♪

engChrName: That bastard sure loves the sound of his own voice.
engSearchText: That bastard sure loves the sound of his own voice.
jpnChrName: ……クソ野郎どもが……
jpnSearchText: ……クソ野郎どもが……

engChrName: Ugh. The situation's gone from bad, to worse, to shit.
engSearchText: Ugh. The situation's gone from bad, to worse, to shit.
jpnChrName: チッ…… 想像していた以上の状況だな。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……
想像していた以上の状況だな。

engChrName: That's putting it mildly. I cannot fathom how they acquired so many explosives...
engSearchText:
That's putting it mildly. I cannot fathom how they
acquired so many explosives...
jpnChrName: くっ、反応兵器に加えて 各街区にまで爆弾を……！？
jpnSearchText:
くっ、反応兵器に加えて
各街区にまで爆弾を……！？

engChrName: If they really are as powerful as a railway gun, then we're in a LOT of trouble.
engSearchText:
If they really are as powerful as a railway gun, then
we're in a LOT of trouble.
jpnChrName: 列車砲級の火薬式爆弾…… 多分、恐ろしいほどの威力です。
jpnSearchText:
列車砲級の火薬式爆弾……
多分、恐ろしいほどの威力です。

engChrName: I imagine Melchior devised that part of the plan. And unfortunately, we would need more than three hours to find them on our own.
engSearchText:
I imagine Melchior devised that part of the plan.
And unfortunately, we would need more than three
hours to find them on our own.
jpnChrName: あのメルキオルの仕業でしょうが…… 捜索している時間はなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
あのメルキオルの仕業でしょうが……
捜索している時間はなさそうですね。

engChrName: I doubt we can tip the police, either. We'd run the risk of the public finding out about this game.
engSearchText:
I doubt we can tip the police, either. We'd run the
risk of the public finding out about this game.
jpnChrName: そうね……外部に漏れる危険を考えると 現地警察にも明かせなさそうだし。
jpnSearchText:
そうね……外部に漏れる危険を考えると
現地警察にも明かせなさそうだし。

engChrName: They planned it all down to the smallest detail... It makes me sick.
engSearchText:
They planned it all down to the smallest detail...
It makes me sick.
jpnChrName: 確かによく考えられていますね。 罪深く、腹立たしいくらいに……
jpnSearchText:
確かによく考えられていますね。
罪深く、腹立たしいくらいに……

engChrName: I don't disagree, but we should focus our energy on the task at hand—namely, defeating the bosses of each zone.
engSearchText:
I don't disagree, but we should focus our energy on
the task at hand—namely, defeating the bosses of
each zone.
jpnChrName: とにかく“担当者”とやらを 止めるしかあるまい、一刻も早く。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく“担当者”とやらを
止めるしかあるまい、一刻も早く。

engChrName: You're right, Master. We shouldn't overthink this.
engSearchText: You're right, Master. We shouldn't overthink this.
jpnChrName: ええ──その意味でやることは 変わらないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──その意味でやることは
変わらないでしょう。

engChrName: Just had a thought. Our group size doesn't really lend itself to quick-and-easy coordination in fights, and we're, uh, a little pressed for time.
engSearchText:
Just had a thought. Our group size doesn't really lend
itself to quick-and-easy coordination in fights, and
we're, uh, a little pressed for time.
jpnChrName: 協力は結んだけど、戦闘での連携を 合わせている時間はなさそうだね。
jpnSearchText:
協力は結んだけど、戦闘での連携を
合わせている時間はなさそうだね。

engChrName: Got a point there. I think the three of us should do our own thing in fights. That way, you don't have to worry about giving orders to everyone.
engSearchText:
Got a point there. I think the three of us should do
our own thing in fights. That way, you don't have to
worry about giving orders to everyone.
jpnChrName: ああ、俺とフィーは適当に合わせるから 指示はしなくて大丈夫だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、俺とフィーは適当に合わせるから
指示はしなくて大丈夫だ。

engChrName: Actually, maybe you can work more closely with them, Elaine. You and Van know each other so well, after all.
engSearchText:
Actually, maybe you can work more closely with
them, Elaine. You and Van know each other so well,
after all.
jpnChrName: エレインは折角だ、ちゃんと連携して そっちのフォローをしてやるといい。
jpnSearchText:
エレインは折角だ、ちゃんと連携して
そっちのフォローをしてやるといい。

engChrName: I would like that. That was actually my plan from the start.
engSearchText:
I would like that. That was actually my plan from
the start.
jpnChrName: ええ、そのつもりです。
jpnSearchText: ええ、そのつもりです。

engChrName: Got'cha. No objections from me.
engSearchText: Got'cha. No objections from me.
jpnChrName: 了解だ──改めてよろしく頼む。
jpnSearchText: 了解だ──改めてよろしく頼む。

engChrName: Now that I think about it, our group size isn't exactly conducive to efficient battle coordination. Time is also a luxury we do not have.
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, our group size isn't exactly
conducive to efficient battle coordination. Time is
also a luxury we do not have.
jpnChrName: 協力は結びましたが、戦闘での連携を 合わせている時間はなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
協力は結びましたが、戦闘での連携を
合わせている時間はなさそうですね。

engChrName: Agreed. Then for efficiency's sake, I will act on my own. You do not need to give me any orders.
engSearchText:
Agreed. Then for efficiency's sake, I will act on
my own. You do not need to give me any orders.
jpnChrName: ええ、私と銀殿は適当に合わせましょう。 指示は不要ですのでご心配なく。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、私と銀殿は適当に合わせましょう。
指示は不要ですのでご心配なく。

engChrName: Fine by me.
engSearchText: Fine by me.
jpnChrName: ああ、負担も減りそうだし助かる。 上手い事やっていくとしようぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、負担も減りそうだし助かる。
上手い事やっていくとしようぜ。

engChrName: I just had a thought. Our group size is not conducive to efficient battle coordination. Time is not on our side, so perhaps I should act on my own.
engSearchText:
I just had a thought. Our group size is not conducive
to efficient battle coordination. Time is not on our
side, so perhaps I should act on my own.
jpnChrName: 協力は結んだものの、戦闘での連携を 合わせている時間はなさそうですな。
jpnSearchText:
協力は結んだものの、戦闘での連携を
合わせている時間はなさそうですな。

and all.

engChrName: Heh. You've got sharper fangs than that scrawny mint-haired bitch. I like you.

You can think of me as this game's ref. I'm here to
carry out the observational system's will.

That way, when it finds a couple of cheaters like you,
I can deliver a little dose of punishment.

teams joinin' up never crossed our minds.

would've blown ya sky high by now.

chosen to ally with the most dangerous jaeger corps in
the East.
jpnChrName: ……さすがに東部最強の 猟兵団が一緒となると話が違う。
jpnSearchText:
……さすがに東部最強の
猟兵団が一緒となると話が違う。

engChrName: ...but that still leaves reason number two—you've chosen to ally with the society.
engSearchText:
...but that still leaves reason number two—you've
chosen to ally with the society.
jpnChrName: ……さすがに《結社》が 一緒となると話が違ってくる。
jpnSearchText:
……さすがに《結社》が
一緒となると話が違ってくる。

engChrName: And I'm not about to stand aside and let you be corrupted by them.
engSearchText:
And I'm not about to stand aside and let you be
corrupted by them.
jpnChrName: その“濁り”──このまま 看過しちまってもいいものかとな。
jpnSearchText:
その“濁り”──このまま
看過しちまってもいいものかとな。

engChrName: Zin...
engSearchText: Zin...
jpnChrName: ジン……
jpnSearchText: ジン……

engChrName: No one's corruptin' anyone. We're the same people we always were—and always will be.
engSearchText:
No one's corruptin' anyone. We're the same people
we always were—and always will be.
jpnChrName: ……俺たちは俺たちだ。 濁るつもりも、染まるつもりもねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
……俺たちは俺たちだ。
濁るつもりも、染まるつもりもねぇ。

engChrName: Sounds like an empty platitude, my friend. You'll have to back your words up.
engSearchText:
Sounds like an empty platitude, my friend.
You'll have to back your words up.
jpnChrName: フフ、言葉だけじゃあな。 だから改めて証明してもらおうか？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、言葉だけじゃあな。
だから改めて証明してもらおうか？

engChrName: And what better way to prove your point than by beating us in battle? Show me your indomitable spirit—with your fists.
engSearchText:
And what better way to prove your point than by
beating us in battle? Show me your indomitable
spirit—with your fists.
jpnChrName: 相容れぬ者を取り込んでまで“勝ち”に 拘ろうとする、お前たちの覚悟と実力を。
jpnSearchText:
相容れぬ者を取り込んでまで“勝ち”に
拘ろうとする、お前たちの覚悟と実力を。

engChrName: Well, I tried. Guess we're doin' this the hard way!
engSearchText: Well, I tried. Guess we're doin' this the hard way!
jpnChrName: ちっ、仕方ない──腹を括るぞ！
jpnSearchText: ちっ、仕方ない──腹を括るぞ！

engChrName: Why're you like this, man? You don't have to concoct some lame-ass excuses to throw down the gauntlet.
engSearchText:
Why're you like this, man? You don't have to concoct
some lame-ass excuses to throw down the gauntlet.
jpnChrName: クク、メンドくせぇ野郎だ。 口実がなきゃ喧嘩もできねぇのか？
jpnSearchText:
クク、メンドくせぇ野郎だ。
口実がなきゃ喧嘩もできねぇのか？

engChrName: Course I do. After all, I have the honor of the Bracer Guild's supporting gauntlet to abide by.
engSearchText:
Course I do. After all, I have the honor of the Bracer
Guild's supporting gauntlet to abide by.
jpnChrName: 規約に準ずる遊撃士だからな。
jpnSearchText: 規約に準ずる遊撃士だからな。

engChrName: I can't throw it around willy-nilly. we aren't exactly free to do whatever we want—unlike you snakes.
engSearchText:
I can't throw it around willy-nilly. we aren't exactly
free to do whatever we want—unlike you snakes.
jpnChrName: あり得ないほど自由すぎる お前らと一緒にしないでもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
あり得ないほど自由すぎる
お前らと一緒にしないでもらおう。

engChrName: I'm sure the adults can handle themselves, but the kids are more susceptible to suggestion.
engSearchText:
I'm sure the adults can handle themselves, but the
kids are more susceptible to suggestion.
jpnChrName: ま、大人組はともかく他の子たちは 利用されないかちょっと心配。
jpnSearchText:
ま、大人組はともかく他の子たちは
利用されないかちょっと心配。

engChrName: I trust Rixia, but I can't say the same for Cao. 'Suspicious' might as well be his middle name.
engSearchText:
I trust Rixia, but I can't say the same for Cao.
'Suspicious' might as well be his middle name.
jpnChrName: 《銀（リーシャ）》はともかく、 《白蘭竜》は毎度胡散臭すぎるし。
jpnSearchText:
《銀（リーシャ）》はともかく、
《白蘭竜》は毎度胡散臭すぎるし。

engChrName: Oh, my. What did I do to deserve these unflattering accusations?
engSearchText:
Oh, my. What did I do to deserve these
unflattering accusations?
jpnChrName: これは手厳しいですねえ。 かつて協力した仲だというのに。
jpnSearchText:
これは手厳しいですねえ。
かつて協力した仲だというのに。

engChrName: Do you even have to ask?
engSearchText: Do you even have to ask?
jpnChrName: ……まあ、妥当な評価かと。
jpnSearchText: ……まあ、妥当な評価かと。

engChrName: I doubt you're a good influence, Divine Blade of Silver.
engSearchText:
I doubt you're a good influence, Divine Blade
of Silver.
jpnChrName: 特に《白銀の剣聖》……
jpnSearchText: 特に《白銀の剣聖》……

engChrName: I've heard stories about you. You trained under the same master as Rean—and had a brief confrontation with him not too long ago.
engSearchText:
I've heard stories about you. You trained under the
same master as Rean—and had a brief confrontation
with him not too long ago.
jpnChrName: 姉弟子だかなんだかは知らないけど 前にリィンが世話になったみたいだね？
jpnSearchText:
姉弟子だかなんだかは知らないけど
前にリィンが世話になったみたいだね？

engChrName: Heehee. So he's been telling all his little friends about me? How flattering.
engSearchText:
Heehee. So he's been telling all his little friends
about me? How flattering.
jpnChrName: ふふ、彼の関係者だったっけ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、彼の関係者だったっけ。

engChrName: Oh, and I've heard about you, too. Did you know I met your boss once? I am VERY interested to see just what his little squirt is made of!
engSearchText:
Oh, and I've heard about you, too. Did you know I
met your boss once? I am VERY interested to see just
what his little squirt is made of!
jpnChrName: 猟兵王殿にも見（まみ）えたことがある。 成長ぶりを見せてもらおうかな？
jpnSearchText:
猟兵王殿にも見（まみ）えたことがある。
成長ぶりを見せてもらおうかな？

engChrName: Call me 'little squirt' one more time and I will end you.
engSearchText:
Call me 'little squirt' one more time and I will
end you.
jpnChrName: ……なんかムカつく。
jpnSearchText: ……なんかムカつく。

engChrName: And those two society creeps are a bad influence.
engSearchText: And those two society creeps are a bad influence.
jpnChrName: ……なにせトップクラスの 危険人物が二人もついてる。
jpnSearchText:
……なにせトップクラスの
危険人物が二人もついてる。

engChrName: If we're doing this, then I'm going all out. Fair warning.
engSearchText:
If we're doing this, then I'm going all out.
Fair warning.
jpnChrName: ──やるからには手加減しないわ。
jpnSearchText: ──やるからには手加減しないわ。

engChrName: Your group has the advantage in numbers, so if you lose to us here, then, chances are, you would have never made it to the end.
engSearchText:
Your group has the advantage in numbers, so if you
lose to us here, then, chances are, you would have
never made it to the end.
jpnChrName: どのみちその数で私たちに 後れを取るようなら論外でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
どのみちその数で私たちに
後れを取るようなら論外でしょう。

engChrName: Hope you're ready, Van.
engSearchText: Hope you're ready, Van.
jpnChrName: 覚悟なさい、ヴァン……！
jpnSearchText: 覚悟なさい、ヴァン……！

engChrName: Always. Let's do this thing!
engSearchText: Always. Let's do this thing!
jpnChrName: 仕方ねえ── こっちも本気で行かせてもらうぜ！
jpnSearchText:
仕方ねえ──
こっちも本気で行かせてもらうぜ！

engChrName: Darn. We lost this one.
engSearchText: Darn. We lost this one.
jpnChrName: ……やれやれ、俺たちの負けだ。
jpnSearchText: ……やれやれ、俺たちの負けだ。

engChrName: Well, that was unsatisfying. You should've gone down way quicker, considering how outnumbered you were.
engSearchText:
Well, that was unsatisfying. You should've gone down
way quicker, considering how outnumbered you were.
jpnChrName: チッ……この戦力差で そこまで粘りきるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……この戦力差で
そこまで粘りきるとはな。

engChrName: You better join me for a real one-on-one later.
engSearchText: You better join me for a real one-on-one later.
jpnChrName: オイ、後で改めて付き合えや。 こっちは不完全燃焼なんだからよ。
jpnSearchText:
オイ、後で改めて付き合えや。
こっちは不完全燃焼なんだからよ。

engChrName: Already itching for more, huh? Well, if I'm free, sure.
engSearchText: Already itching for more, huh? Well, if I'm free, sure.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… ま、身体が空いたらな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
ま、身体が空いたらな。

engChrName: Despite the odds, they put up a good fight.
engSearchText: Despite the odds, they put up a good fight.
jpnChrName: フフ…… なかなかの一戦であった。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……
なかなかの一戦であった。

engChrName: Indeed. Though I expected as much from the elites of the Calvardian guild.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Though I expected as much from the elites of
the Calvardian guild.
jpnChrName: さすがは共和国ギルドを担う 最精鋭の遊撃士方でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
さすがは共和国ギルドを担う
最精鋭の遊撃士方でしたね。

engChrName: We're quite lucky we have such reliable companions. The two of us may have been overwhelmed had we faced them alone.
engSearchText:
We're quite lucky we have such reliable companions.
The two of us may have been overwhelmed had we
faced them alone.
jpnChrName: フフ、もし私たちだけなら 突破は難しかったでしょうねえ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、もし私たちだけなら
突破は難しかったでしょうねえ。

engChrName: I can't deny that. All three are exceptionally strong.
engSearchText: I can't deny that. All three are exceptionally strong.
jpnChrName: ええ── どなたも歴戦の方ですし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──
どなたも歴戦の方ですし。

engChrName: I knew Zin the Immovable would pose a challenge, but the other two were quite formidable as well.
engSearchText:
I knew Zin the Immovable would pose a challenge,
but the other two were quite formidable as well.
jpnChrName: かの《不動》も含め…… やはり侮れませぬな。
jpnSearchText:
かの《不動》も含め……
やはり侮れませぬな。

engChrName: Yeah. The little squir—I mean, Sylphid was stronger than I anticipated.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The little squir—I mean, Sylphid was stronger
than I anticipated.
jpnChrName: うん、《妖精》も期待以上だし、 それに──
jpnSearchText:
うん、《妖精》も期待以上だし、
それに──

engChrName: Well, that sucked. I thought we'd put up more of a fight, but you guys are tough as nails.
engSearchText:
Well, that sucked. I thought we'd put up more of a
fight, but you guys are tough as nails.
jpnChrName: もうちょっとやれると思ったけど…… 流石にそのメンツと人数相手じゃ厳しい。
jpnSearchText:
もうちょっとやれると思ったけど……
流石にそのメンツと人数相手じゃ厳しい。

engChrName: That, and we were badly outnumbered. Feels like we never had a chance to begin with.
engSearchText:
That, and we were badly outnumbered. Feels like we
never had a chance to begin with.
jpnChrName: というかズルいかな。
jpnSearchText: というかズルいかな。

engChrName: Hey, you were the ones who picked a fight with us. Should've known what you were signing up for.
engSearchText:
Hey, you were the ones who picked a fight with us.
Should've known what you were signing up for.
jpnChrName: ったく…… それを承知で始めたんだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……
それを承知で始めたんだろうが。

engChrName: (Although, that grizzly bear still looks like he could go another round or two.)
engSearchText:
(Although, that grizzly bear still looks like he could
go another round or two.)
jpnChrName: （と言っても《不動》はまだ   余力を残してる感じだし──）
jpnSearchText:
（と言っても《不動》はまだ
余力を残してる感じだし──）

engChrName: (Same goes for Elaine.)
engSearchText: (Same goes for Elaine.)
jpnChrName: （……エレインの奴も   乗り切れてはなさそうだったな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……エレインの奴も
乗り切れてはなさそうだったな。）

engChrName: (Well, the silver lining in all this is that we won't have to worry about the surface. They can take care of things there.)
engSearchText:
(Well, the silver lining in all this is that we won't have
to worry about the surface. They can take care of
things there.)
jpnChrName: （ま、今後地上をこいつらに任せれば   こっちとしても安心ってモンだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、今後地上をこいつらに任せれば
こっちとしても安心ってモンだが。）

engChrName: *sigh* Actually, this works out perfectly for me.
engSearchText: *sigh* Actually, this works out perfectly for me.
jpnChrName: ふう…… ……まあ丁度良かったわね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
……まあ丁度良かったわね。

engChrName: Huh? Did you say something?
engSearchText: Huh? Did you say something?
jpnChrName: ……エレインさん？
jpnSearchText: ……エレインさん？

engChrName: Oh, yes. Congratulations. Victory is yours.
engSearchText: Oh, yes. Congratulations. Victory is yours.
jpnChrName: ──おめでとう、 貴方たちの勝ちよ。
jpnSearchText:
──おめでとう、
貴方たちの勝ちよ。

engChrName: And so are these cards.
engSearchText: And so are these cards.
jpnChrName: 受け取りな、アークライド。
jpnSearchText: 受け取りな、アークライド。

engChrName: Received two keycards.
engSearchText: Received two keycards.
jpnChrName: アクセスキーを２つ手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アクセスキーを２つ手に入れた。

engChrName: Team Bracer has been eliminated.
engSearchText: Team Bracer has been eliminated.
jpnChrName: チーム　遊撃士協会　　脱落
jpnSearchText: チーム　遊撃士協会　　脱落

engChrName: Score. Can't believe we managed to nab two of these at once.
engSearchText:
Score. Can't believe we managed to nab two of these
at once.
jpnChrName: 確かに受け取った。 にしてもいきなり２個とはな。
jpnSearchText:
確かに受け取った。
にしてもいきなり２個とはな。

engChrName: You all have thoroughly convinced me that you won't be swayed by those dubious forces...
engSearchText:
You all have thoroughly convinced me that you won't
be swayed by those dubious forces...
jpnChrName: とにかく、お前さんたちの 覚悟と実力は見せてもらった。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、お前さんたちの
覚悟と実力は見せてもらった。

engChrName: ...and that these cards are in safe hands. I trust you.
engSearchText: ...and that these cards are in safe hands. I trust you.
jpnChrName: これなら安心して 後のことを任せられるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
これなら安心して
後のことを任せられるだろう。

engChrName: We'll make sure that trust isn't misplaced.
engSearchText: We'll make sure that trust isn't misplaced.
jpnChrName: アンタらの期待に 沿いきれる保証はできねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
アンタらの期待に
沿いきれる保証はできねぇが……

engChrName: You sure it's okay for the guild to be pullin' out this early, though?
engSearchText:
You sure it's okay for the guild to be pullin' out this
early, though?
jpnChrName: しかしギルドがこんな早い段階で 手を引いていいのか？
jpnSearchText:
しかしギルドがこんな早い段階で
手を引いていいのか？

engChrName: The lives of 280,000 people hang in the balance. This isn't the time to be worrying about saving face.
engSearchText:
The lives of 280,000 people hang in the balance.
This isn't the time to be worrying about saving face.
jpnChrName: ２８万人の命が掛かってるんだ。 面子に拘るつもりは毛頭ない。
jpnSearchText:
２８万人の命が掛かってるんだ。
面子に拘るつもりは毛頭ない。

engChrName: Besides, we won't be sitting idly by—we'll be holding down the fort outside.
engSearchText:
Besides, we won't be sitting idly by—we'll be holding
down the fort outside.
jpnChrName: 脱落してもやるべき事は山程ある。 地上のことは基本俺たちに任せろ。
jpnSearchText:
脱落してもやるべき事は山程ある。
地上のことは基本俺たちに任せろ。

engChrName: If you take down any major baddies, call us up. We'll come back down and take them to the station.
engSearchText:
If you take down any major baddies, call us up.
We'll come back down and take them to the station.
jpnChrName: ま、今後厄介な連中とか下したら 連絡してくれれば駆け付けるから。
jpnSearchText:
ま、今後厄介な連中とか下したら
連絡してくれれば駆け付けるから。

engChrName: The rules only specified that we can't interfere with the 'remaining' players. Catch my drift?
engSearchText:
The rules only specified that we can't interfere with
the 'remaining' players. Catch my drift?
jpnChrName: “参加者”の資格を失った相手なら 干渉しても良さそうだったし。
jpnSearchText:
“参加者”の資格を失った相手なら
干渉しても良さそうだったし。

engChrName: I suppose you're right. We can't help you directly...
engSearchText: I suppose you're right. We can't help you directly...
jpnChrName: ……そうね、攻略の直接の 手助けまではできないけれど。
jpnSearchText:
……そうね、攻略の直接の
手助けまではできないけれど。

engChrName: ...but we have other means of backing you up.
engSearchText: ...but we have other means of backing you up.
jpnChrName: そうしたバックアップは期待して。
jpnSearchText: そうしたバックアップは期待して。

engChrName: Wow. You guys sure are reliable!
engSearchText: Wow. You guys sure are reliable!
jpnChrName: 皆さん……
jpnSearchText: 皆さん……

engChrName: And crafty, too. They had a contingency plan all along.
engSearchText:
And crafty, too. They had a contingency plan
all along.
jpnChrName: チッ……そこまで 織り込み済みだったとはな。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……そこまで
織り込み済みだったとはな。

engChrName: Thank you for your support. We're counting on you!
engSearchText: Thank you for your support. We're counting on you!
jpnChrName: ……ありがとうございます。 頼りにさせて頂きますね。
jpnSearchText:
……ありがとうございます。
頼りにさせて頂きますね。

engChrName: And we'll be counting on you as well—to win this thing in our stead and bring some villains to justice. Can you do that for us?
engSearchText:
And we'll be counting on you as well—to win this
thing in our stead and bring some villains to justice.
Can you do that for us?
jpnChrName: そんじゃ、俺たちは行くぜ。 あっさり脱落するんじゃないぞ？
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃ、俺たちは行くぜ。
あっさり脱落するんじゃないぞ？

engChrName: Sure thing, big guy.
engSearchText: Sure thing, big guy.
jpnChrName: ああ──任せてくれ。
jpnSearchText: ああ──任せてくれ。

engChrName: ...Wait.
engSearchText: ...Wait.
jpnChrName: ……待った。
jpnSearchText: ……待った。

engChrName: I can sense two groups beyond this door—and they're locked in combat.
engSearchText:
I can sense two groups beyond this door—and they're
locked in combat.
jpnChrName: この先に複数の気配があるね。 しかも、戦闘中だ。
jpnSearchText:
この先に複数の気配があるね。
しかも、戦闘中だ。

engChrName: Could it be...!
engSearchText: Could it be...!
jpnChrName: もしかして……！
jpnSearchText: もしかして……！

engChrName: One of them's the Kruga. I'm sure of it!
engSearchText: One of them's the Kruga. I'm sure of it!
jpnChrName: 間違いありません、片方はクルガです！
jpnSearchText: 間違いありません、片方はクルガです！

engChrName: And I'm almost positive the other one's the Eisenschild.
engSearchText:
And I'm almost positive the other one's
the Eisenschild.
jpnChrName: そしてもう片方は…… 恐らくアイゼンシルトです！
jpnSearchText:
そしてもう片方は……
恐らくアイゼンシルトです！

engChrName: Wait!
engSearchText: Wait!
jpnChrName: 待ってください……！
jpnSearchText: 待ってください……！

engChrName: What's wrong?
engSearchText: What's wrong?
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん？
jpnSearchText: フェリちゃん？

engChrName: I can sense a lot of people on the other side of this door—and they're locked in a fierce battle!
engSearchText:
I can sense a lot of people on the other side of this
door—and they're locked in a fierce battle!
jpnChrName: この先に多数の気配があります。 それも……戦闘中のようです！
jpnSearchText:
この先に多数の気配があります。
それも……戦闘中のようです！

engChrName: Oh, damn. Wonder who we're dealin' with?
engSearchText: Oh, damn. Wonder who we're dealin' with?
jpnChrName: どの勢力か分かるか？
jpnSearchText: どの勢力か分かるか？

engChrName: One of them's the Kruga for sure.
engSearchText: One of them's the Kruga for sure.
jpnChrName: 片方はクルガで間違いありません。 もう片方は……
jpnSearchText:
片方はクルガで間違いありません。
もう片方は……

engChrName: And I'm almost positive the other one's the Eisenschild.
engSearchText:
And I'm almost positive the other one's
the Eisenschild.
jpnChrName: 恐らく、アイゼンシルトです！
jpnSearchText: 恐らく、アイゼンシルトです！

engChrName: What should we do, then? You're from one of those groups, right?
engSearchText:
What should we do, then? You're from one of those
groups, right?
jpnChrName: ……どうするの？ 片方は貴女の身内なんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
……どうするの？
片方は貴女の身内なんでしょう？

engChrName: ...Yeah.
engSearchText: ...Yeah.
jpnChrName: ……はい。
jpnSearchText: ……はい。

engChrName: Well, make up your mind quick. It won't be long before they notice we're here.
engSearchText:
Well, make up your mind quick. It won't be long
before they notice we're here.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ここでまごまごしてると こっちの存在もすぐ気付かれそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ここでまごまごしてると
こっちの存在もすぐ気付かれそうだな。

engChrName: Don't think I need to spell out what the worst-case scenario is.
engSearchText:
Don't think I need to spell out what the worst-case
scenario is.
jpnChrName: この場合、避けるべき展開が一つある。
jpnSearchText: この場合、避けるべき展開が一つある。

engChrName: A three-way brawl wouldn't be a fun time. And if they ganged up on us, we'd be totally screwed.
engSearchText:
A three-way brawl wouldn't be a fun time. And if
they ganged up on us, we'd be totally screwed.
jpnChrName: 三つ巴の乱戦はまだいい、一番ヤバイのは 他が手を組んでこっちを狙うことだ。
jpnSearchText:
三つ巴の乱戦はまだいい、一番ヤバイのは
他が手を組んでこっちを狙うことだ。

engChrName: Yup. Taking on one jaeger corps would be challenging enough, but two at once? That's just asking for trouble.
engSearchText:
Yup. Taking on one jaeger corps would be
challenging enough, but two at once? That's just
asking for trouble.
jpnChrName: 確かに……あのクラスの団に 挟み撃ちでもされたら厳しいかな。
jpnSearchText:
確かに……あのクラスの団に
挟み撃ちでもされたら厳しいかな。

engChrName: Our odds of winning in that scenario would be quite low.
engSearchText:
Our odds of winning in that scenario would be
quite low.
jpnChrName: ええ……確かにそうなれば かなり厳しくなりそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……確かにそうなれば
かなり厳しくなりそうですね。

engChrName: I say we go for it. I bet I can take them down with one hand tied behind my back.
engSearchText:
I say we go for it. I bet I can take them down with
one hand tied behind my back.
jpnChrName: うーん…… 何とかなりそうな気もするけど？
jpnSearchText:
うーん……
何とかなりそうな気もするけど？

engChrName: Somehow I doubt that. Anyway, you ain't callin' the shots here, Princess. I am.
engSearchText:
Somehow I doubt that. Anyway, you ain't callin' the
shots here, Princess. I am.
jpnChrName: お前さんだけならな…… だがこの場は俺たちに従ってもらう。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんだけならな……
だがこの場は俺たちに従ってもらう。

engChrName: I vote to try, anyway. I would rather enjoy the challenge.
engSearchText:
I vote to try, anyway. I would rather enjoy
the challenge.
jpnChrName: それはそれでおもろそうやけど？
jpnSearchText: それはそれでおもろそうやけど？

engChrName: You are one crazy lady. Well, no one else is in favor, so sorry.
engSearchText:
You are one crazy lady. Well, no one else is in favor,
so sorry.
jpnChrName: いや面白くねえよ…… この場は俺たちに従ってもらう。
jpnSearchText:
いや面白くねえよ……
この場は俺たちに従ってもらう。

engChrName: Are there any other alternatives?
engSearchText: Are there any other alternatives?
jpnChrName: でも……だったらどうするの？
jpnSearchText: でも……だったらどうするの？

engChrName: There's one—we back one of them up.
engSearchText: There's one—we back one of them up.
jpnChrName: ──どちらか片方に手を貸す。
jpnSearchText: ──どちらか片方に手を貸す。

engChrName: That'd make the chance of them turning on us nil. It'd also make it way easier to win.
engSearchText:
That'd make the chance of them turning on us nil.
It'd also make it way easier to win.
jpnChrName: そうすれば両方に狙われることはないし、 勝つのも難しくはないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
そうすれば両方に狙われることはないし、
勝つのも難しくはないだろう。

engChrName: A sound plan. Well, if we're backing one of them, then it has to be the Kr—
engSearchText:
A sound plan. Well, if we're backing one of them,
then it has to be the Kr—
jpnChrName: ……理屈は分かりました。 片方を選ぶとしたら、やっぱり……
jpnSearchText:
……理屈は分かりました。
片方を選ぶとしたら、やっぱり……

engChrName: No, it doesn't have to be them. Please, don't let me be a factor in your decision.
engSearchText:
No, it doesn't have to be them. Please, don't let me be
a factor in your decision.
jpnChrName: いえ、わたしのことは 抜きにして考えてください。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、わたしのことは
抜きにして考えてください。

engChrName: B-But...
engSearchText: B-But...
jpnChrName: で、でも、フェリちゃん。
jpnSearchText: で、でも、フェリちゃん。

engChrName: Are you certain you're all right with fighting your own people?
engSearchText:
Are you certain you're all right with fighting your
own people?
jpnChrName: よろしいのですか？ 戦士団と対立してしまっても。
jpnSearchText:
よろしいのですか？
戦士団と対立してしまっても。

engChrName: Positive. After all, I'm not with them right now. I'm with you guys.
engSearchText:
Positive. After all, I'm not with them right now.
I'm with you guys.
jpnChrName: いまのわたしは《アークライド解決事務所》に 雇われている身です。
jpnSearchText:
いまのわたしは《アークライド解決事務所》に
雇われている身です。

engChrName: And if I have to treat them like enemies on the battlefield, then so be it.
engSearchText:
And if I have to treat them like enemies on the
battlefield, then so be it.
jpnChrName: 敵として戦場で相対すれば、たとえ 親族だろうと手加減すべきではありません。
jpnSearchText:
敵として戦場で相対すれば、たとえ
親族だろうと手加減すべきではありません。

engChrName: I won't let my emotions cloud my judgment. Doing so would be dishonoring the Warriors of Kruga name.
engSearchText:
I won't let my emotions cloud my judgment.
Doing so would be dishonoring the Warriors of
Kruga name.
jpnChrName: 情で判断を誤るのはもってのほか── 各々の焔の導きに従うのがクルガの戦士です。
jpnSearchText:
情で判断を誤るのはもってのほか──
各々の焔の導きに従うのがクルガの戦士です。

engChrName: So don't worry about me. I want you to choose based on what you think is best.
engSearchText:
So don't worry about me. I want you to choose based
on what you think is best.
jpnChrName: ですからあくまで解決事務所の “流儀”に合う方を選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
ですからあくまで解決事務所の
“流儀”に合う方を選んでください。

engChrName: Well, if you're sure.
engSearchText: Well, if you're sure.
jpnChrName: 分かった、お前がそう言うなら。
jpnSearchText: 分かった、お前がそう言うなら。

engChrName: Just so you know, the Warriors of Kruga despise groups like Almata who involve civilians in their conflicts.
engSearchText:
Just so you know, the Warriors of Kruga despise
groups like Almata who involve civilians in
their conflicts.
jpnChrName: ……ちなみに戦士団はアルマータのような、 民を巻き込むやり方を嫌悪しています。
jpnSearchText:
……ちなみに戦士団はアルマータのような、
民を巻き込むやり方を嫌悪しています。

engChrName: I have no clue who they're working for now...
engSearchText: I have no clue who they're working for now...
jpnChrName: どこの依頼かは分かりませんが……
jpnSearchText: どこの依頼かは分かりませんが……

engChrName: ...but my guess is they're here to put a permanent end to Almata.
engSearchText:
...but my guess is they're here to put a permanent end
to Almata.
jpnChrName: 恐らく彼らに対する今回の方針は 『問答無用で殲滅』──だと思います。
jpnSearchText:
恐らく彼らに対する今回の方針は
『問答無用で殲滅』──だと思います。

engChrName: I do know that the Eisenschild serves as a law enforcement agency for the free cities.
engSearchText:
I do know that the Eisenschild serves as a law
enforcement agency for the free cities.
jpnChrName: 対するアイゼンシルトは自由都市圏の 治安維持なども請け負っている団です。
jpnSearchText:
対するアイゼンシルトは自由都市圏の
治安維持なども請け負っている団です。

engChrName: Unfortunately, I have no inkling as to who their current employer is.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, I have no inkling as to who their
current employer is.
jpnChrName: やはり依頼者は分かりませんが──
jpnSearchText: やはり依頼者は分かりませんが──

engChrName: If I were to speculate, I would say their goal is to take Almata into custody rather than execute them.
engSearchText:
If I were to speculate, I would say their goal is to take
Almata into custody rather than execute them.
jpnChrName: 恐らくアルマータに対する今回の方針は 『無力化して拘束』の可能性が高いかと。
jpnSearchText:
恐らくアルマータに対する今回の方針は
『無力化して拘束』の可能性が高いかと。

engChrName: So one's here to kill, one's here to arrest.
engSearchText: So one's here to kill, one's here to arrest.
jpnChrName: 殲滅派のクルガと 拘束派のアイゼンシルトか……
jpnSearchText:
殲滅派のクルガと
拘束派のアイゼンシルトか……

engChrName: (Which of 'em are we gonna side with?)
engSearchText: (Which of 'em are we gonna side with?)
jpnChrName: （さて、どっちに加勢するか──）
jpnSearchText: （さて、どっちに加勢するか──）

engChrName: Hmm? Is that not...?
engSearchText: Hmm? Is that not...?
jpnChrName: む？　あれは……
jpnSearchText: む？　あれは……

engChrName: That spriggan?!
engSearchText: That spriggan?!
jpnChrName: 首都の裏解決屋か……！
jpnSearchText: 首都の裏解決屋か……！

engChrName: We're Arkride Solutions—and we're lendin' a hand to the Warriors of Kruga!
engSearchText:
We're Arkride Solutions—and we're lendin' a hand to
the Warriors of Kruga!
jpnChrName: 《アークライド解決事務所》だ！ ──クルガ戦士団、加勢するぞ！
jpnSearchText:
《アークライド解決事務所》だ！
──クルガ戦士団、加勢するぞ！

engChrName: We'll be fighting at your side, Abi!
engSearchText: We'll be fighting at your side, Abi!
jpnChrName: お父さん（アブ）、共に戦います！
jpnSearchText: お父さん（アブ）、共に戦います！

engChrName: Hahaha. So, you're proposing a temporary alliance, eh?
engSearchText:
Hahaha. So, you're proposing a temporary
alliance, eh?
jpnChrName: ハハハ、なるほどな── この場限りの共闘ということか！
jpnSearchText:
ハハハ、なるほどな──
この場限りの共闘ということか！

engChrName: That's right. We're not here to decide who's right or wrong, but we're takin' a side regardless!
engSearchText:
That's right. We're not here to decide who's right or
wrong, but we're takin' a side regardless!
jpnChrName: ああ、是非はともかく、 片方には降りてもらおうか！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、是非はともかく、
片方には降りてもらおうか！

engChrName: Well, this took a turn for the worse... And you brought bracers with you, too?
engSearchText:
Well, this took a turn for the worse... And you
brought bracers with you, too?
jpnChrName: 厄介な…… しかもギルドまで一緒とはな。
jpnSearchText:
厄介な……
しかもギルドまで一緒とはな。

engChrName: Sorry 'bout this. I'd rather side with you guys than them, but it wasn't my choice to make.
engSearchText:
Sorry 'bout this. I'd rather side with you guys than
them, but it wasn't my choice to make.
jpnChrName: スタンスはアンタらに近いが…… ま、ここは観念してもらおうか。
jpnSearchText:
スタンスはアンタらに近いが……
ま、ここは観念してもらおうか。

engChrName: Well, this took a turn for the worse... And you brought Heiyue with you, too?
engSearchText:
Well, this took a turn for the worse... And you
brought Heiyue with you, too?
jpnChrName: 厄介な…… しかも黒月も一緒とはな。
jpnSearchText:
厄介な……
しかも黒月も一緒とはな。

engChrName: Fate is certainly a curious creature, no?
engSearchText: Fate is certainly a curious creature, no?
jpnChrName: ふふ、成り行きのようなものですが。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、成り行きのようなものですが。

engChrName: Well, this took a turn for the worse... And of all the people you could've brought along...
engSearchText:
Well, this took a turn for the worse... And of all the
people you could've brought along...
jpnChrName: 厄介な…… しかもよりにもよって……！
jpnSearchText:
厄介な……
しかもよりにもよって……！

engChrName: Hello! Nice to see you boys again. It's been, what, a couple weeks now?
engSearchText:
Hello! Nice to see you boys again. It's been, what, a
couple weeks now?
jpnChrName: ふふ、半月ぶりかな？ 意外と早い再会になったね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、半月ぶりかな？
意外と早い再会になったね。

engChrName: Well, this took a turn for the worse... And you formed an alliance with the society?!
engSearchText:
Well, this took a turn for the worse... And you
formed an alliance with the society?!
jpnChrName: 厄介な…… しかもかの結社が一緒とは！
jpnSearchText:
厄介な……
しかもかの結社が一緒とは！

engChrName: You guys look tougher than our reinforced jaegers, I'll give you that.
engSearchText:
You guys look tougher than our reinforced jaegers, I'll
give you that.
jpnChrName: へぇ、ウチの強化猟兵よりは 歯ごたえがありそうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、ウチの強化猟兵よりは
歯ごたえがありそうじゃねえか。

engChrName: I will leave the regimental commander to you. We'll take care of the rest!
engSearchText:
I will leave the regimental commander to you.
We'll take care of the rest!
jpnChrName: ならば連隊長殿の相手を頼む！ こちらは残りを全て引きつけよう！
jpnSearchText:
ならば連隊長殿の相手を頼む！
こちらは残りを全て引きつけよう！

engChrName: Works for me!
engSearchText: Works for me!
jpnChrName: ああ、それで構わねえ！
jpnSearchText: ああ、それで構わねえ！

engChrName: The odds are stacked against us, but we will not be defeated! Our will is ironclad, and our resolve cannot be broken!
engSearchText:
The odds are stacked against us, but we will not
be defeated! Our will is ironclad, and our resolve
cannot be broken!
jpnChrName: ……劣勢とはいえ《鉄の盾》、 簡単に砕けると思わぬことだ。
jpnSearchText:
……劣勢とはいえ《鉄の盾》、
簡単に砕けると思わぬことだ。

engChrName: Men, to arms!
engSearchText: Men, to arms!
jpnChrName: 総員──迎撃開始！
jpnSearchText: 総員──迎撃開始！

engChrName: Ja!
engSearchText: Ja!
jpnChrName: Ｊａ（ヤー）！！
jpnSearchText: Ｊａ（ヤー）！！

engChrName: The battle is won. Accept your defeat with grace, Commander Geraint.
engSearchText:
The battle is won. Accept your defeat with grace,
Commander Geraint.
jpnChrName: 今回は我らの勝ちだ、ゲラント連隊長。
jpnSearchText: 今回は我らの勝ちだ、ゲラント連隊長。

engChrName: I had thought we would emerge victorious, but alas. It was not meant to be.
engSearchText:
I had thought we would emerge victorious, but alas.
It was not meant to be.
jpnChrName: そのようだな、ハサン副頭目。 途中までは上回れたつもりだったが……
jpnSearchText:
そのようだな、ハサン副頭目。
途中までは上回れたつもりだったが……

engChrName: Arusha has smiled upon us today—we must give Her thanks.
engSearchText:
Arusha has smiled upon us today—we must give
Her thanks.
jpnChrName: 運が我らに味方した。 焔と翼の女神（アルーシャ）に感謝だな。
jpnSearchText:
運が我らに味方した。
焔と翼の女神（アルーシャ）に感謝だな。

engChrName: Indeed. She was on your side this time.
engSearchText: Indeed. She was on your side this time.
jpnChrName: それもまた戦場の常──
jpnSearchText: それもまた戦場の常──

engChrName: To the victor goes the spoils.
engSearchText: To the victor goes the spoils.
jpnChrName: 勝利の証を。
jpnSearchText: 勝利の証を。

engChrName: Geraint handed Hasan his keycard.
engSearchText: Geraint handed Hasan his keycard.
jpnChrName: ゲラントはハサンにアクセスキーを渡した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ゲラントはハサンにアクセスキーを渡した。

engChrName: Team Eisenschild A has been eliminated.
engSearchText: Team Eisenschild A has been eliminated.
jpnChrName: チーム　アイゼンシルト第１分隊　　脱落
jpnSearchText: チーム　アイゼンシルト第１分隊　　脱落

engChrName: Glory to the Kruga! Glory to Arusha!
engSearchText: Glory to the Kruga! Glory to Arusha!
jpnChrName: クルガに焔と翼の女神（アルーシャ）の栄光あれ！
jpnSearchText: クルガに焔と翼の女神（アルーシャ）の栄光あれ！

engChrName: Yaaaaah!
engSearchText: Yaaaaah!
jpnChrName: おおおおおおっ……！
jpnSearchText: おおおおおおっ……！

engChrName: We have no reason to remain here. Let us withdraw to the surface!
engSearchText:
We have no reason to remain here. Let us withdraw
to the surface!
jpnChrName: 敗者が留まる意味はない。 速やかに地上へ撤収する！
jpnSearchText:
敗者が留まる意味はない。
速やかに地上へ撤収する！

engChrName: Ja!
engSearchText: Ja!
jpnChrName: Ｊａ（ヤー）！
jpnSearchText: Ｊａ（ヤー）！

engChrName: You have our thanks for your timely support.
engSearchText: You have our thanks for your timely support.
jpnChrName: ヴァン殿、まずは礼を言おう。 ご助力、感謝する。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン殿、まずは礼を言おう。
ご助力、感謝する。

engChrName: I'm assuming you do not intend to fight us here, correct?
engSearchText:
I'm assuming you do not intend to fight us
here, correct?
jpnChrName: さて──この場で我らと戦う つもりはないと思っていいのだな？
jpnSearchText:
さて──この場で我らと戦う
つもりはないと思っていいのだな？

engChrName: Nah. We've got all the keycards we need already.
engSearchText: Nah. We've got all the keycards we need already.
jpnChrName: ああ、そっちがどうかは知らんが……
jpnSearchText: ああ、そっちがどうかは知らんが……

engChrName: But if you really wanna try your luck against us, then I'm game.
engSearchText:
But if you really wanna try your luck against us, then
I'm game.
jpnChrName: こちらは既に“条件”は整えている。 アンタらがそのつもりなら受けて立つが？
jpnSearchText:
こちらは既に“条件”は整えている。
アンタらがそのつもりなら受けて立つが？

engChrName: Hahaha. No, no. We would rather avoid back-to-back battles if we can help it.
engSearchText:
Hahaha. No, no. We would rather avoid
back-to-back battles if we can help it.
jpnChrName: ハハハ、なら安心した。 連戦はさすがに堪えるのでな。
jpnSearchText:
ハハハ、なら安心した。
連戦はさすがに堪えるのでな。

engChrName: Abi.
engSearchText: Abi.
jpnChrName: お父さん（アブ）……
jpnSearchText: お父さん（アブ）……

engChrName: I had my eye on you during that fight, Ferida, and I was very impressed by what I saw.
engSearchText:
I had my eye on you during that fight, Ferida, and I
was very impressed by what I saw.
jpnChrName: フェリーダ、見ていたぞ。 立派な戦いぶりであった。
jpnSearchText:
フェリーダ、見ていたぞ。
立派な戦いぶりであった。

engChrName: Sending you off to Van's was not a mistake, after all. He's been treating you well, I hope?
engSearchText:
Sending you off to Van's was not a mistake, after all.
He's been treating you well, I hope?
jpnChrName: ヴァン殿のもとへ送ったこと、 間違いではなかったようだな。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン殿のもとへ送ったこと、
間違いではなかったようだな。

engChrName: Uh-huh! They've all been super nice to me!
engSearchText: Uh-huh! They've all been super nice to me!
jpnChrName: えへへ、はいっ！
jpnSearchText: えへへ、はいっ！

engChrName: (She seems really happy.)
engSearchText: (She seems really happy.)
jpnChrName: （フェリちゃん……嬉しそうです。）
jpnSearchText: （フェリちゃん……嬉しそうです。）

engChrName: (I'm glad she didn't have to fight them.)
engSearchText: (I'm glad she didn't have to fight them.)
jpnChrName: （それに、やっぱりお父さんたちと   戦わずに済んでよかった……）
jpnSearchText:

──アイゼンシルト、加勢するぞ！

Excellent. The tide of battle is shifting in our favor!

unwelcome one.

This is a prime opportunity to put what you learned
these past few months to the test!

この数ヶ月での成長ぶり、
我らに見せてみるがよい！

with everything I have!

jpnSearchText: はい！　全力で行きます！

own daughter...

それにしても──

engSearchText: ...but I did not foresee you allying with bracers.

can well imagine. So we're taking you out of
the game.

precedes you.

まさか東に名高き
《斑鳩》まで一緒とはな……！

そちらこそ──
全力でお相手つかまつる。

まさか悪名高き

the rest!

grasp, but it slipped through our fingers this time.

now is not the time. We cannot linger here.

I'll do the best I can.

難しいですが向き合ってみます。

our thanks.

さて──この場で我らと戦う

I'm game.

本当に良かったんですか？

むしろいい機会でした。

my people...

少しだけ残念ですが……

the future! So I'm good.

engChrName: Okay, then. If you're sure.

anytime soon, so you'll be able to impress him even
