engSearchText:
The center of this zone awaits us on the other side of
this door.
jpnChrName: どうやらこの先が 上層領域の中心部のようですね。
jpnSearchText:
どうやらこの先が
上層領域の中心部のようですね。

engChrName: We've got all the cards we need to open it, right?
engSearchText: We've got all the cards we need to open it, right?
jpnChrName: 規定のキーも何とか揃ってる。
jpnSearchText: 規定のキーも何とか揃ってる。

engChrName: Then let's show this Almata boss who's boss!
engSearchText: Then let's show this Almata boss who's boss!
jpnChrName: いよいよアルマータの幹部と ご対面ってわけね……！
jpnSearchText:
いよいよアルマータの幹部と
ご対面ってわけね……！

engChrName: Hold up. Before we charge in guns blazing, I gotta confirm somethin' first.
engSearchText:
Hold up. Before we charge in guns blazing, I gotta
confirm somethin' first.
jpnChrName: その前に一つ確認させてもらう。
jpnSearchText: その前に一つ確認させてもらう。

engChrName: Confirm what?
engSearchText: Confirm what?
jpnChrName: 確認……ですか？
jpnSearchText: 確認……ですか？

engChrName: That you're all ready for what might happen in there.
engSearchText: That you're all ready for what might happen in there.
jpnChrName: お前らの“覚悟”だ。
jpnSearchText: お前らの“覚悟”だ。

engChrName: C'mon, dude. How many times do we gotta tell you we're ready to risk our lives—
engSearchText:
C'mon, dude. How many times do we gotta tell you
we're ready to risk our lives—
jpnChrName: アア？　何を今さら──
jpnSearchText: アア？　何を今さら──

engChrName: This ain't about risking lives. It's about taking 'em.
engSearchText: This ain't about risking lives. It's about taking 'em.
jpnChrName: 命をかけるでも守るでもなく、 その逆の方の覚悟だ。
jpnSearchText:
命をかけるでも守るでもなく、
その逆の方の覚悟だ。

engChrName: What...?
engSearchText: What...?
jpnChrName: それって……
jpnSearchText: それって……

engChrName: These're the guys who took the lives of everyone in Creil, and they're prepared to do the same to the people here. No telling what they'll pull.
engSearchText:
These're the guys who took the lives of everyone in
Creil, and they're prepared to do the same to the
people here. No telling what they'll pull.
jpnChrName: 今回の相手はクレイユ村を全滅させ、 さらに２８万の人質を取ってる連中だ。
jpnSearchText:
今回の相手はクレイユ村を全滅させ、
さらに２８万の人質を取ってる連中だ。

engChrName: Best-case scenario, we go in there, crack some skulls, and throw 'em behind bars—but the actual outcome could be much, much uglier.
engSearchText:
Best-case scenario, we go in there, crack some skulls,
and throw 'em behind bars—but the actual outcome
could be much, much uglier.
jpnChrName: 単に倒して拘束するだけじゃ 終わらない可能性がある。
jpnSearchText:
単に倒して拘束するだけじゃ
終わらない可能性がある。

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...

engChrName: Now, I ain't sayin' you guys have to do the deed. That'd be my job.
engSearchText:
Now, I ain't sayin' you guys have to do the deed.
That'd be my job.
jpnChrName: ──仮に“そう”なった場合、 お前らにやらせるつもりはない。
jpnSearchText:
──仮に“そう”なった場合、
お前らにやらせるつもりはない。

engChrName: Though even if you don't have their blood on your hands, you'll still be involved in whatever happens, and you'll have to live with the guilt.
engSearchText:
Though even if you don't have their blood on your
hands, you'll still be involved in whatever happens,
and you'll have to live with the guilt.
jpnChrName: だが、居合わせる以上は 当事者になることからは逃げられねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
だが、居合わせる以上は
当事者になることからは逃げられねぇ。

engChrName: You sure you're ready for that?
engSearchText: You sure you're ready for that?
jpnChrName: それでもこの先に進む覚悟が、 お前たちにあるか？
jpnSearchText:
それでもこの先に進む覚悟が、
お前たちにあるか？

jpnChrName: （ヴァン……）
jpnSearchText: （ヴァン……）

engChrName: (It's a reasonable thing to ask. We're against killing, too, but when things are down to the wire...)
engSearchText:
(It's a reasonable thing to ask. We're against killing,
too, but when things are down to the wire...)
jpnChrName: （ま、わたしたちも基本、   不殺が流儀だけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、わたしたちも基本、
不殺が流儀だけど……）

engChrName: (...we place the lives of civilians above all else.)
engSearchText: (...we place the lives of civilians above all else.)
jpnChrName: （民間人の命が天秤に掛かったら   その限りじゃないからな。）
jpnSearchText:
（民間人の命が天秤に掛かったら
その限りじゃないからな。）

engChrName: The weight of such an act is heavier than you could imagine. It's a burden you may have to carry for the rest of your lives.
engSearchText:
The weight of such an act is heavier than you
could imagine. It's a burden you may have to carry for
the rest of your lives.
jpnChrName: ……その重圧、 おそらくは想像以上であろう。
jpnSearchText:
……その重圧、
おそらくは想像以上であろう。

engChrName: There is absolutely no shame in staying behind—
engSearchText: There is absolutely no shame in staying behind—
jpnChrName: 場合によっては ここで待機するのも──
jpnSearchText:
場合によっては
ここで待機するのも──

engChrName: Can it, Gramps. Like I was saying earlier— c'mon, dude.
engSearchText:
Can it, Gramps. Like I was saying earlier—
c'mon, dude.
jpnChrName: フン…… だから今更だっつってんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
フン……
だから今更だっつってんだろ。

engChrName: I knew it might go down like this since the very damn start. Hell, I'll take them out myself if I have to.
engSearchText:
I knew it might go down like this since the very
damn start. Hell, I'll take them out myself if I have to.
jpnChrName: ケツは定まった── 必要なら俺がやったっていい。
jpnSearchText:
ケツは定まった──
必要なら俺がやったっていい。

engChrName: I feel the same way.
engSearchText: I feel the same way.
jpnChrName: はい、言わずもがなです。
jpnSearchText: はい、言わずもがなです。

engChrName: The lives of so many innocents are at stake here. I'll do whatever I can to protect them.
engSearchText:
The lives of so many innocents are at stake here.
I'll do whatever I can to protect them.
jpnChrName: 郷と民と共にあるクルガ戦士として── 罪なき人々の犠牲を出さないためにも。
jpnSearchText:
郷と民と共にあるクルガ戦士として──
罪なき人々の犠牲を出さないためにも。

engChrName: As your concierge, my duty is to you. Turning away now would be shirking my responsibilities.
engSearchText:
As your concierge, my duty is to you. Turning away
now would be shirking my responsibilities.
jpnChrName: わたくしも──ＳＣとしての 責務を果たすまででしょう。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしも──ＳＣとしての
責務を果たすまででしょう。

engChrName: Listen, I might not always be on the 'right' side of the law, but that's one line I never dared cross.
engSearchText:
Listen, I might not always be on the 'right' side of the
law, but that's one line I never dared cross.
jpnChrName: あたしも……“裏”での活動で その一線は守ってきたつもりだったけど。
jpnSearchText:
あたしも……“裏”での活動で
その一線は守ってきたつもりだったけど。

engChrName: These scumbags, on the other hand, have crossed it one too many times—so if that's how it has to be, then so be it.
engSearchText:
These scumbags, on the other hand, have crossed it
one too many times—so if that's how it has to be,
then so be it.
jpnChrName: ヤツらはあまりに奪いすぎた── 止める方法がそれしかないなら、覚悟を決めるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ヤツらはあまりに奪いすぎた──
止める方法がそれしかないなら、覚悟を決めるわ。

engChrName: If I'm being perfectly honest, I'm scared. I don't know how I'd live with myself if the worst came to pass...
engSearchText:
If I'm being perfectly honest, I'm scared. I don't know
how I'd live with myself if the worst came to pass...
jpnChrName: ……正直、僕は怖いかな。 そこまで割り切れる自信はないよ。
jpnSearchText:
……正直、僕は怖いかな。
そこまで割り切れる自信はないよ。

engChrName: ...but if the nuclear devices go off, that will be the least of my worries. I'd rather help than do nothing.
engSearchText:
...but if the nuclear devices go off, that will be the
least of my worries. I'd rather help than do nothing.
jpnChrName: だけど、背負う覚悟ならできてるつもりだ。 反応兵器を悪用されないためにもね。
jpnSearchText:
だけど、背負う覚悟ならできてるつもりだ。
反応兵器を悪用されないためにもね。

engChrName: The Geneses have caused so much pain and suffering. I don't want their power to be abused any further...
engSearchText:
The Geneses have caused so much pain and suffering.
I don't want their power to be abused any further...
jpnChrName: ……これ以上、“遺産”の悪用で 哀しむ人たちを増やさないためにも。
jpnSearchText:
……これ以上、“遺産”の悪用で
哀しむ人たちを増やさないためにも。

engChrName: ...so if that's what it comes to, then I'll handle it. I'll shoulder that burden with everyone here. So yes, I'm ready, Van.
engSearchText:
...so if that's what it comes to, then I'll handle it.
I'll shoulder that burden with everyone here. So yes,
I'm ready, Van.
jpnChrName: そのためなら背負ってみせます、 私もヴァンさんたちと一緒に……！
jpnSearchText:
そのためなら背負ってみせます、
私もヴァンさんたちと一緒に……！

engChrName: Got'cha.
engSearchText: Got'cha.
jpnChrName: ………そうか。
jpnSearchText: ………そうか。

engChrName: Well, there's your answer. Looks like everyone's on board.
engSearchText:
Well, there's your answer. Looks like everyone's
on board.
jpnChrName: ……覚悟は決まったみたいだね。
jpnSearchText: ……覚悟は決まったみたいだね。

engChrName: Guess so, yeah. You guys ready to kick some ass?
engSearchText: Guess so, yeah. You guys ready to kick some ass?
jpnChrName: ああ、待たせて悪かったな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、待たせて悪かったな。

engChrName: Heh. Always.
engSearchText: Heh. Always.
jpnChrName: いいってことさ── 俺たちも最大限支えるつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
いいってことさ──
俺たちも最大限支えるつもりだ。

engChrName: I assume you are ready, then?
engSearchText: I assume you are ready, then?
jpnChrName: “準備”は整ったようですね？
jpnSearchText: “準備”は整ったようですね？

engChrName: Yeah. We're all set now.
engSearchText: Yeah. We're all set now.
jpnChrName: ああ、十分だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、十分だ。

engChrName: Then let's move on. We'll support you as best we can.
engSearchText: Then let's move on. We'll support you as best we can.
jpnChrName: 行きましょう── 私たちも最大限サポートします。
jpnSearchText:
行きましょう──
私たちも最大限サポートします。

engChrName: Are you finished?
engSearchText: Are you finished?
jpnChrName: 万事、整われたかな？
jpnSearchText: 万事、整われたかな？

engChrName: Yeah. We're good.
engSearchText: Yeah. We're good.
jpnChrName: ああ、問題ない。
jpnSearchText: ああ、問題ない。

engChrName: Then let's get a move on already.
engSearchText: Then let's get a move on already.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ行こうか。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ行こうか。

engChrName: Come on, man. Overprotective much?
engSearchText: Come on, man. Overprotective much?
jpnChrName: やれやれ、過保護かよ。
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、過保護かよ。

engChrName: Heehee. I didn't take you for a family man, Van, dear. Or perhaps you're more like a mother hen...
engSearchText:
Heehee. I didn't take you for a family man,
Van, dear. Or perhaps you're more like a
mother hen...
jpnChrName: フフ、どうせなるようにしか ならへんやろにねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、どうせなるようにしか
ならへんやろにねぇ。

engChrName: Ah, shut up. Let's just head through the damn door.
engSearchText: Ah, shut up. Let's just head through the damn door.
jpnChrName: これがウチの流儀でな。 そんじゃあ行くぞ……！
jpnSearchText:
これがウチの流儀でな。
そんじゃあ行くぞ……！

engChrName: Keycards confirmed. The door has been unlocked.
engSearchText: Keycards confirmed. The door has been unlocked.
jpnChrName: 規定数のアクセスキーを認証。 ロックを解除。
jpnSearchText:
規定数のアクセスキーを認証。
ロックを解除。

engChrName: Well, guess there's no going back.
engSearchText: Well, guess there's no going back.
jpnChrName: もう後戻り、できないってわけね。
jpnSearchText: もう後戻り、できないってわけね。

engChrName: Indeed. There's no way I'd let you leave now—not when you've kept me waiting ever so long.
engSearchText:
Indeed. There's no way I'd let you leave now—not
when you've kept me waiting ever so long.
jpnChrName: その通りさ──ようやく来たねェ。 待ちくたびれたじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
その通りさ──ようやく来たねェ。
待ちくたびれたじゃないか。

engChrName: Hah. Why the long faces? You're the first team here! Rejoice! Turn those frowns upside down.
engSearchText:
Hah. Why the long faces? You're the first team here!
Rejoice! Turn those frowns upside down.
jpnChrName: ハッ、どうしたんだい？ 一番乗りなんだからもっと喜びな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、どうしたんだい？
一番乗りなんだからもっと喜びな。

engChrName: No can do. Not while the crazy sadist is in the house.
engSearchText: No can do. Not while the crazy sadist is in the house.
jpnChrName: 出やがったな、サド女……
jpnSearchText: 出やがったな、サド女……

engChrName: So is that thing next to you the activation switch for the bomb?
engSearchText:
So is that thing next to you the activation switch for
the bomb?
jpnChrName: その隣にあるのは……
jpnSearchText: その隣にあるのは……

engChrName: Yes, you're right on the mark.
engSearchText: Yes, you're right on the mark.
jpnChrName: ああ、メルキオルが街に仕掛けた 火薬式爆弾とやらの起爆装置さ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、メルキオルが街に仕掛けた
火薬式爆弾とやらの起爆装置さ。

engChrName: A shame it'll only kill a measly few thousand. The one from the palace can wipe out hundreds of thousands. It's a more impressive toy, to be sure.
engSearchText:
A shame it'll only kill a measly few thousand.
The one from the palace can wipe out hundreds
of thousands. It's a more impressive toy, to be sure.
jpnChrName: 数千人は吹っ飛ばせるらしいが──どうせなら 例の“オモチャ”を起爆したかったけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
数千人は吹っ飛ばせるらしいが──どうせなら
例の“オモチャ”を起爆したかったけどねぇ。

engChrName: Did you just call it...a toy?!
engSearchText: Did you just call it...a toy?!
jpnChrName: っ……オモチャ、だって……？
jpnSearchText: っ……オモチャ、だって……？

engChrName: It's a weapon of mass destruction—not some tool for your amusement!
engSearchText:
It's a weapon of mass destruction—not some tool for
your amusement!
jpnChrName: あれはアンタたちが軽々しく 扱っていいものじゃない──！
jpnSearchText:
あれはアンタたちが軽々しく
扱っていいものじゃない──！

engChrName: Oh, but it is. As far as I'm concerned, it's just a child's plaything—much like the people in this game, in fact.
engSearchText:
Oh, but it is. As far as I'm concerned, it's just a child's
plaything—much like the people in this game, in fact.
jpnChrName: アタシにとっちゃただのオモチャさ。 だってこれは“ゲーム”なんだからねェ。
jpnSearchText:
アタシにとっちゃただのオモチャさ。
だってこれは“ゲーム”なんだからねェ。

engChrName: All of you, including the 280,000 in this city, are nothing more than toy soldiers—fated to be cast into the fire when broken.
engSearchText:
All of you, including the 280,000 in this city, are
nothing more than toy soldiers—fated to be cast into
the fire when broken.
jpnChrName: ２８万の命を賭けての、ただの“遊び”さ。
jpnSearchText: ２８万の命を賭けての、ただの“遊び”さ。

engChrName: How can you say something so...inhumane?
engSearchText: How can you say something so...inhumane?
jpnChrName: どうして…… どうしてそんなことが出来るんですか……
jpnSearchText:
どうして……
どうしてそんなことが出来るんですか……

engChrName: The people of Creil, Oración, and all the other towns and cities lead very real lives.
engSearchText:
The people of Creil, Oración, and all the other towns
and cities lead very real lives.
jpnChrName: クレイユの人たちも、オラシオンの人たちも、 他の街の人たちも……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユの人たちも、オラシオンの人たちも、
他の街の人たちも……

engChrName: You think they don't matter? That their lives hold no meaning?
engSearchText:
You think they don't matter? That their lives hold
no meaning?
jpnChrName: そして私たちも、貴女たちだって──
jpnSearchText: そして私たちも、貴女たちだって──

engChrName: Well, they do. Every single human life is equal and precious. They're all—
engSearchText:
Well, they do. Every single human life is equal
and precious. They're all—
jpnChrName: その人だけの人生を歩んできた、 たった一人の人間だっていうのに……！
jpnSearchText:
その人だけの人生を歩んできた、
たった一人の人間だっていうのに……！

engChrName: Shut your mouth.
engSearchText: Shut your mouth.
jpnChrName: その人だけの人生…… ……たった一人の人間、ねえ……
jpnSearchText:
その人だけの人生……
……たった一人の人間、ねえ……

engChrName: Kindly take that 'equality' bullshit and shove it.
engSearchText: Kindly take that 'equality' bullshit and shove it.
jpnChrName: アンタたち──まさか人の命や人生が 全て平等とか抜かすんじゃないだろうねぇ？
jpnSearchText:
アンタたち──まさか人の命や人生が
全て平等とか抜かすんじゃないだろうねぇ？

engChrName: I can tell you had a decent upbringing just by looking at you.
engSearchText:
I can tell you had a decent upbringing just by looking
at you.
jpnChrName: 小娘、身なりを見れば分かるよ。 アンタ結構いい所の生まれなんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
小娘、身なりを見れば分かるよ。
アンタ結構いい所の生まれなんだろ？

engChrName: Tell me, have you ever imagined what it'd be like to go from riches to rags? To have all that privilege stripped from you in the blink of an eye?
engSearchText:
Tell me, have you ever imagined what it'd be like to
go from riches to rags? To have all that privilege
stripped from you in the blink of an eye?
jpnChrName: その恵まれた人生が、ある日突然 粉々に砕けちまうのを想像した事があるかい？
jpnSearchText:
その恵まれた人生が、ある日突然
粉々に砕けちまうのを想像した事があるかい？

engChrName: Well, I hadn't, either...until it really happened to me.
engSearchText: Well, I hadn't, either...until it really happened to me.
jpnChrName: アタシはしなかったさ──その日が来るまで。
jpnSearchText: アタシはしなかったさ──その日が来るまで。

engChrName: Like you, I was once an ignorant little girl—born into a noble family in a small country in the Central East. We lived a happy, blissful life...
engSearchText:
Like you, I was once an ignorant little girl—born into
a noble family in a small country in the Central East.
We lived a happy, blissful life...
jpnChrName: 中東のとある小国の 貴族に生まれた何も知らない幸せな娘……
jpnSearchText:
中東のとある小国の
貴族に生まれた何も知らない幸せな娘……

engChrName: ...but it all went up in flames. The mad race for resources and mira in the Central East led my country and my family to ruin.
engSearchText:
...but it all went up in flames. The mad race for
resources and mira in the Central East led my country
and my family to ruin.
jpnChrName: だけど中東で起きた資源獲得とマネーゲームで 故郷の国も、うちの家もあっけなく没落した。
jpnSearchText:
だけど中東で起きた資源獲得とマネーゲームで
故郷の国も、うちの家もあっけなく没落した。

engChrName: After that, I just kept falling and falling and falling...
engSearchText: After that, I just kept falling and falling and falling...
jpnChrName: それからは絵に描いたような転落劇──
jpnSearchText: それからは絵に描いたような転落劇──

engChrName: I thought I hit the bottom when I was sold to an organized crime group, but the abyss swallowed me up and sent me spiraling further down.
engSearchText:
I thought I hit the bottom when I was sold to an
organized crime group, but the abyss swallowed me
up and sent me spiraling further down.
jpnChrName: 堕ちるに堕ちて犯罪組織に売られちまっても それはまだ底ですらなかった。
jpnSearchText:
堕ちるに堕ちて犯罪組織に売られちまっても
それはまだ底ですらなかった。

engChrName: I was trampled on...and violated over and over again. I'm sure that sort of life is foreign to you, huh, little girl?
engSearchText:
I was trampled on...and violated over and over again.
I'm sure that sort of life is foreign to you,
huh, little girl?
jpnChrName: 男どもに次々と踏みにじられ、穢され── そんな人生を想像したことがあるかい？
jpnSearchText:
男どもに次々と踏みにじられ、穢され──
そんな人生を想像したことがあるかい？

engChrName: All right, so you had a rough go of it. That still doesn't mean you get to go around blowing up cities.
engSearchText:
All right, so you had a rough go of it. That still
doesn't mean you get to go around blowing up cities.
jpnChrName: チッ……不幸自慢でもしてぇのか？
jpnSearchText: チッ……不幸自慢でもしてぇのか？

engChrName: I often think back to when I first heard the news of that Erebonian prince's marriage.
engSearchText:
I often think back to when I first heard the news of
that Erebonian prince's marriage.
jpnChrName: ああ──そう言えば去年だったねェ、 帝国の皇子サマのあの電撃結婚の報道は。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──そう言えば去年だったねェ、
帝国の皇子サマのあの電撃結婚の報道は。

engChrName: When I learned he wedded a Central Eastern orphan, I couldn't help but laugh.
engSearchText:
When I learned he wedded a Central Eastern orphan,
I couldn't help but laugh.
jpnChrName: 相手は中東系の孤児出身の女ときたもんだ── クク、これが笑わずにいられるかい？
jpnSearchText:
相手は中東系の孤児出身の女ときたもんだ──
クク、これが笑わずにいられるかい？

engChrName: She and I are one and the same—yet she lives a life of royalty while I'm stuck in squalor. How is that fair?
engSearchText:
She and I are one and the same—yet she lives a life of
royalty while I'm stuck in squalor. How is that fair?
jpnChrName: アタシとそいつにどんな違いがあったってんだい。 片や掃き溜め、片や帝国皇子のお妃様だ。
jpnSearchText:
アタシとそいつにどんな違いがあったってんだい。
片や掃き溜め、片や帝国皇子のお妃様だ。

engChrName: The answer is that it isn't. This world is rotten to the core—with injustice ingrained so deep it's become impossible to root it out.
engSearchText:
The answer is that it isn't. This world is rotten to the
core—with injustice ingrained so deep it's become
impossible to root it out.
jpnChrName: 改めて確信したよ、そんな不公平がまかり通るのが アタシたちが生きてるこの世界なんだってね。
jpnSearchText:
改めて確信したよ、そんな不公平がまかり通るのが
アタシたちが生きてるこの世界なんだってね。

engChrName: And what about those innocent people you're killing, hmm? What did they ever do to you?!
engSearchText:
And what about those innocent people you're
killing, hmm? What did they ever do to you?!
jpnChrName: だからこの世に報復しようっていうの……！？ 罪もない、大勢の人間を巻き込んで！
jpnSearchText:
だからこの世に報復しようっていうの……！？
罪もない、大勢の人間を巻き込んで！

engChrName: Oh, I very much hope they all burn—along with this wretched world. I've wanted that for so long now.
engSearchText:
Oh, I very much hope they all burn—along with this
wretched world. I've wanted that for so long now.
jpnChrName: ああ、全部ブッ壊れちまえばいい── ずっとそう思っていた。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、全部ブッ壊れちまえばいい──
ずっとそう思っていた。

engChrName: For so, so, soooooo long.
engSearchText: For so, so, soooooo long.
jpnChrName: ずっとずっと、ずっとずっとずっと……
jpnSearchText: ずっとずっと、ずっとずっとずっと……

engChrName: Nevertheless, I came to realize that wouldn't fully satiate my desire for revenge...
engSearchText:
Nevertheless, I came to realize that wouldn't fully
satiate my desire for revenge...
jpnChrName: だけど、ある時気づかされたんだよ、 それだけじゃまだ足りないってねェ。
jpnSearchText:
だけど、ある時気づかされたんだよ、
それだけじゃまだ足りないってねェ。

engChrName: ...so I clawed my way up the very organization that abused me. I manipulated my way to the top...
engSearchText:
...so I clawed my way up the very organization that
abused me. I manipulated my way to the top...
jpnChrName: 踏みにじってきた男どもを手玉に取って……
jpnSearchText: 踏みにじってきた男どもを手玉に取って……

engChrName: ...and right as I hit the peak, I met the man who would change my life forever.
engSearchText:
...and right as I hit the peak, I met the man who
would change my life forever.
jpnChrName: 泥水をすすりながら、ある組織の長にまで 上り詰めたアタシの前に現れたんだよ──
jpnSearchText:
泥水をすすりながら、ある組織の長にまで
上り詰めたアタシの前に現れたんだよ──

engChrName: Gerard Dantès.
engSearchText: Gerard Dantès.
jpnChrName: あの人が──ジェラール・ダンテスが。
jpnSearchText: あの人が──ジェラール・ダンテスが。

engChrName: He brought our organization to its knees—as he does with all his enemies.
engSearchText:
He brought our organization to its knees—as he does
with all his enemies.
jpnChrName: あたしの組織を含めた一切をねじ伏せ、 強引に自分の傘下に引き入れて──
jpnSearchText:
あたしの組織を含めた一切をねじ伏せ、
強引に自分の傘下に引き入れて──

engChrName: Then he brought it under his heel—by subjecting my allies, my foes, and even me to an all-consuming fear.
engSearchText:
Then he brought it under his heel—by subjecting my
allies, my foes, and even me to an all-consuming fear.
jpnChrName: あたしの敵も、味方も、あたし自身も、 問答無用に──“恐怖”をもって支配した。
jpnSearchText:
あたしの敵も、味方も、あたし自身も、
問答無用に──“恐怖”をもって支配した。

engChrName: In the face of that fear, everyone is equal—no matter where you're born, who you are, or what you've done.
engSearchText:
In the face of that fear, everyone is equal—no matter
where you're born, who you are, or what you've done.
jpnChrName: あの“恐怖”の前では、誰もが同じだったんだ。 どんな出身も、立場も、過去も無意味……
jpnSearchText:
あの“恐怖”の前では、誰もが同じだったんだ。
どんな出身も、立場も、過去も無意味……

engChrName: And that's when I realized something: the terror that man brings to the world...is the ultimate equalizer!
engSearchText:
And that's when I realized something: the terror that
man brings to the world...is the ultimate equalizer!
jpnChrName: ようやくアタシは気づけたのさ── ボスがもたらす“恐怖”だけが平等なんだとねぇ！！
jpnSearchText:
ようやくアタシは気づけたのさ──
ボスがもたらす“恐怖”だけが平等なんだとねぇ！！

engChrName: So, in short, you met the worst possible person at the worst possible time.
engSearchText:
So, in short, you met the worst possible person at the
worst possible time.
jpnChrName: ……最悪な状況で最悪な相手と 出会っちまったってわけか……
jpnSearchText:
……最悪な状況で最悪な相手と
出会っちまったってわけか……

engChrName: I sympathize. The hole in your heart was filled in the most twisted way possible.
engSearchText:
I sympathize. The hole in your heart was filled in the
most twisted way possible.
jpnChrName: ええ、そして欠けた心の拠り所を、 歪（いびつ）な形で埋められてしまった……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そして欠けた心の拠り所を、
歪（いびつ）な形で埋められてしまった……

engChrName: I'm beginning to pity you. You've led a hard life.
engSearchText: I'm beginning to pity you. You've led a hard life.
jpnChrName: ……そんなのって………
jpnSearchText: ……そんなのって………

engChrName: I don't want your pity, you damn brats! You know nothing about us!
engSearchText:
I don't want your pity, you damn brats! You know
nothing about us!
jpnChrName: アンタたち如きが ボスとアタシを語るんじゃないよ！
jpnSearchText:
アンタたち如きが
ボスとアタシを語るんじゃないよ！

engChrName: But everyone WILL know true fear very soon. Our boss' new world is nearly upon us!
engSearchText:
But everyone WILL know true fear very soon.
Our boss' new world is nearly upon us!
jpnChrName: もう、目の前まで来てるんだ…… ボスが築く新しい世界と“真の恐怖”が。
jpnSearchText:
もう、目の前まで来てるんだ……
ボスが築く新しい世界と“真の恐怖”が。

engChrName: Sadly, you won't be a part of it. Your existence would be a blight on his world, so I will eradicate you!
engSearchText:
Sadly, you won't be a part of it. Your existence would
be a blight on his world, so I will eradicate you!
jpnChrName: アンタたちはせいぜい、 踏み台になって潰れちまいな……！
jpnSearchText:
アンタたちはせいぜい、
踏み台になって潰れちまいな……！

engChrName: Wait. Is that...?
engSearchText: Wait. Is that...?
jpnChrName: その反応、まさか……
jpnSearchText: その反応、まさか……

engChrName: This is just like that time under the capital— when those mafiosos took power-enhancing drugs.
engSearchText:
This is just like that time under the capital—
when those mafiosos took power-enhancing drugs.
jpnChrName: も、もしかして首都の地下遺跡で マフィアたちがやったような……！
jpnSearchText:
も、もしかして首都の地下遺跡で
マフィアたちがやったような……！

engChrName: Looks like she got one hell of a boost from 'em, too. Careful, guys!
engSearchText:
Looks like she got one hell of a boost from 'em, too.
Careful, guys!
jpnChrName: 薬物強化（ドラッグブースト）……！ だがこいつは……！
jpnSearchText:
薬物強化（ドラッグブースト）……！
だがこいつは……！

engChrName: Ahaha! If you thought those weaklings were tough, you won't last very long against me.
engSearchText:
Ahaha! If you thought those weaklings were tough,
you won't last very long against me.
jpnChrName: アハハ、アンタたちが見た チンケなものと一緒にするんじゃないよ！
jpnSearchText:
アハハ、アンタたちが見た
チンケなものと一緒にするんじゃないよ！

engChrName: We combined our research with another's to attain power beyond our wildest imagination!
engSearchText:
We combined our research with another's to
attain power beyond our wildest imagination!
jpnChrName: コイツは“とある連中”の遺産も応用した 比べ物にならないほど刺激的な特別製さ！
jpnSearchText:
コイツは“とある連中”の遺産も応用した
比べ物にならないほど刺激的な特別製さ！

engChrName: Oh, crap...
engSearchText: Oh, crap...
jpnChrName: ！　そいつは……！
jpnSearchText: ！　そいつは……！

engChrName: Are you referring to that drug from Crossbell?!
engSearchText: Are you referring to that drug from Crossbell?!
jpnChrName: まさか過去にクロスベルで 使われたものを……！？
jpnSearchText:
まさか過去にクロスベルで
使われたものを……！？

engChrName: Oh? Might you be referring to that drug from Crossbell?
engSearchText:
Oh? Might you be referring to that drug
from Crossbell?
jpnChrName: ああ、過去にクロスベルの件で 使われたとかいう……？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、過去にクロスベルの件で
使われたとかいう……？

engChrName: She talkin' about that drug from Crossbell?!
engSearchText: She talkin' about that drug from Crossbell?!
jpnChrName: まさか過去にクロスベルで 使われてたっつう……！？
jpnSearchText:
まさか過去にクロスベルで
使われてたっつう……！？

engChrName: Its main ingredient shouldn't exist anymore, but if I'm wrong, then that's all the more reason to put it out of commission—for good.
engSearchText:
Its main ingredient shouldn't exist anymore, but if I'm
wrong, then that's all the more reason to put it out of
commission—for good.
jpnChrName: もはや“原料”も存在しない筈だが…… ──なおさら捨て置けまい！
jpnSearchText:
もはや“原料”も存在しない筈だが……
──なおさら捨て置けまい！

engChrName: We'll stop at nothing to take you down.
engSearchText: We'll stop at nothing to take you down.
jpnChrName: こっちも退けない、かな……！
jpnSearchText: こっちも退けない、かな……！

engChrName: If they really are connected, then it's my duty to put an end to it. Once and for all.
engSearchText:
If they really are connected, then it's my duty to put
an end to it. Once and for all.
jpnChrName: もし関係があるのなら── 見過ごすわけにはいきません……！
jpnSearchText:
もし関係があるのなら──
見過ごすわけにはいきません……！

engChrName: Haha. You're waaay out of my league. Why don't you down a few more bottles and get back to me, mm'kay?
engSearchText:
Haha. You're waaay out of my league. Why don't you
down a few more bottles and get back to
me, mm'kay?
jpnChrName: フフ、よく知らないが── 薬ごときでどこまで届くかな……！
jpnSearchText:
フフ、よく知らないが──
薬ごときでどこまで届くかな……！

engChrName: Hahaha! You kiddin' me? That shit's for the weak.
engSearchText: Hahaha! You kiddin' me? That shit's for the weak.
jpnChrName: クカカ、クスリごときで イキり散らしてんじゃねぇぞ……！
jpnSearchText:
クカカ、クスリごときで
イキり散らしてんじゃねぇぞ……！

engChrName: Now, then! It's time for the fireworks show! I can't WAIT to see Oración burst into flames!
engSearchText:
Now, then! It's time for the fireworks show! I can't
WAIT to see Oración burst into flames!
jpnChrName: さぁ、オラシオンが 炎と瓦礫に沈むまであと僅かだ──
jpnSearchText:
さぁ、オラシオンが
炎と瓦礫に沈むまであと僅かだ──

engChrName: But first, I will drown you in a sea of fear. Take your final breath, because the tide of death draws near!
engSearchText:
But first, I will drown you in a sea of fear. Take your
final breath, because the tide of death draws near!
jpnChrName: アタシとボスに聞かせな！ 恐怖に染まった豚みたいな鳴き声をねェ！
jpnSearchText:
アタシとボスに聞かせな！
恐怖に染まった豚みたいな鳴き声をねェ！

engChrName: It's over. Time to surrender.
engSearchText: It's over. Time to surrender.
jpnChrName: これで終わりだ、大人しく──
jpnSearchText: これで終わりだ、大人しく──

engChrName: No way in hell I'd do that!
engSearchText: No way in hell I'd do that!
jpnChrName: ッ…… 甘ったれてんじゃないよ！
jpnSearchText:
ッ……
甘ったれてんじゃないよ！

engChrName: (Shit! If I dodge this...)
engSearchText: (Shit! If I dodge this...)
jpnChrName: （ッ、このまま避けたら──）
jpnSearchText: （ッ、このまま避けたら──）

engChrName: (Sorry.)
engSearchText: (Sorry.)
jpnChrName: （悪いな──）
jpnSearchText: （悪いな──）

engChrName: Gah...
engSearchText: Gah...
jpnChrName: かはッ────
jpnSearchText: かはッ────

engChrName: Ah... It's funny how life works...
engSearchText: Ah... It's funny how life works...
jpnChrName: ……ああ……… ………不思議なモンだねェ………
jpnSearchText:
……ああ………
………不思議なモンだねェ………

engChrName: At long last, I'm bidding farewell to this wretched world...
engSearchText:
At long last, I'm bidding farewell to this
wretched world...
jpnChrName: ようやく……このクソみたいな世界と おさらばだっていうのに……
jpnSearchText:
ようやく……このクソみたいな世界と
おさらばだっていうのに……

engChrName: So why...? Why do I feel so...sad?
engSearchText: So why...? Why do I feel so...sad?
jpnChrName: ……なんでこんなに……寂しいんだい……？
jpnSearchText: ……なんでこんなに……寂しいんだい……？

engChrName: Oh, boss...if only I could be by your side one last—
engSearchText: Oh, boss...if only I could be by your side one last—
jpnChrName: ………ボス………… ……最期に、アンタの傍に──
jpnSearchText:
………ボス…………
……最期に、アンタの傍に──
………ぁ…………
…………………………
……っ……

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァンさん……

engChrName: Don't worry about me. This isn't like what happened with Aida, and it's not like it's my first time, either.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about me. This isn't like what happened
with Aida, and it's not like it's my first time, either.
jpnChrName: ……火喰鳥（アイーダ）の時とはワケが違う。 そして、初めてってワケでもねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
……火喰鳥（アイーダ）の時とはワケが違う。
そして、初めてってワケでもねぇ。

engChrName: In a spriggan's line of work, sometimes the situation calls for it—and I'll be damned if I let anyone else here take on that burden.
engSearchText:
In a spriggan's line of work, sometimes the situation
calls for it—and I'll be damned if I let anyone else
here take on that burden.
jpnChrName: これも裏解決屋の顔の一つ── とはいえ背負うのは俺だけでいい。
jpnSearchText:
これも裏解決屋の顔の一つ──
とはいえ背負うのは俺だけでいい。

engChrName: No. I promised I'd shoulder it with everyone, remember?
engSearchText:
No. I promised I'd shoulder it with
everyone, remember?
jpnChrName: ………いいえ、ちゃんと見届けるって 決めましたから。
jpnSearchText:
………いいえ、ちゃんと見届けるって
決めましたから。

engChrName: And you're no exception, Van.
engSearchText: And you're no exception, Van.
jpnChrName: それに……
jpnSearchText: それに……

engChrName: I won't let you bear this alone.
engSearchText: I won't let you bear this alone.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん一人に、背負わせません。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん一人に、背負わせません。
っ………

engChrName: I won't, either. It's too heavy a load for one person.
engSearchText: I won't, either. It's too heavy a load for one person.
jpnChrName: うん……こんなもの、 一人じゃ抱えさせられないよ。
jpnSearchText:
うん……こんなもの、
一人じゃ抱えさせられないよ。
…………………………

engChrName: (The sentimental air in this room is quite thick. It's rather concerning, given who they're up against.)
engSearchText:
(The sentimental air in this room is quite thick.
It's rather concerning, given who they're up against.)
jpnChrName: （“彼ら”相手にこの調子とは。   少々先が思いやられますが……）
jpnSearchText:
（“彼ら”相手にこの調子とは。
少々先が思いやられますが……）

engChrName: (I wouldn't worry. That's just part of who they are.)
engSearchText: (I wouldn't worry. That's just part of who they are.)
jpnChrName: （……いえ、これが   “彼ららしさ”なのでしょう。）
jpnSearchText:
（……いえ、これが
“彼ららしさ”なのでしょう。）

engChrName: (Their reactions are rather...concerning. Will they be able to handle the battles ahead, I wonder?)
engSearchText:
(Their reactions are rather...concerning. Will they be
able to handle the battles ahead, I wonder?)
jpnChrName: （些か心配になりますな。   この調子では──）
jpnSearchText:
（些か心配になりますな。
この調子では──）

engChrName: (Eh, they'll be fine. After all, they've got heartless monsters like us watching over them.)
engSearchText:
(Eh, they'll be fine. After all, they've got heartless
monsters like us watching over them.)
jpnChrName: （なに、我らのような人でなしが   フォローすればいいさ。）
jpnSearchText:
（なに、我らのような人でなしが
フォローすればいいさ。）

engChrName: (Hah. I'm surrounded by a bunch of wusses.)
engSearchText: (Hah. I'm surrounded by a bunch of wusses.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ……   つくづく甘ちゃんだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハッ……
つくづく甘ちゃんだな。）

engChrName: (Heehee. I do not think we are in a position to judge them on the matters of the heart. After all, it is we who are broken.)
engSearchText:
(Heehee. I do not think we are in a position to judge
them on the matters of the heart. After all, it is we
who are broken.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ、まあそう言わんの。   ウチらが壊れてるだけなんやから。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ、まあそう言わんの。
ウチらが壊れてるだけなんやから。）

engChrName: (Sorry.)
engSearchText: (Sorry.)
jpnChrName: （悪いな──）
jpnSearchText: （悪いな──）

engChrName: Guh!
engSearchText: Guh!
jpnSearchText: …………ぐっ…………

engChrName: Whew. Close call.
engSearchText: Whew. Close call.
jpnChrName: ……ふう、間一髪だったな。
jpnSearchText: ……ふう、間一髪だったな。

engChrName: If you thought I'd let you kill someone under my watch, then you're an idiot.
engSearchText:
If you thought I'd let you kill someone under my
watch, then you're an idiot.
jpnChrName: ……馬鹿。 貴方が背負う必要はないわ。
jpnSearchText:
……馬鹿。
貴方が背負う必要はないわ。

engChrName: We won't let you have an unnecessary death on your conscience.
engSearchText:
We won't let you have an unnecessary death on
your conscience.
jpnChrName: そ、わたしたちがいる限りね。
jpnSearchText: そ、わたしたちがいる限りね。

engChrName: You guys...
engSearchText: You guys...
jpnChrName: エレイン、アンタらも……
jpnSearchText: エレイン、アンタらも……

engChrName: Thanks. Guess I owe you one.
engSearchText: Thanks. Guess I owe you one.
jpnChrName: ……スマン、また借りが 出来ちまったみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
……スマン、また借りが
出来ちまったみたいだな。

engChrName: A-Are you okay?!
engSearchText: A-Are you okay?!
jpnChrName: だ、大丈夫ですかっ！？
jpnSearchText: だ、大丈夫ですかっ！？

engChrName: Ugh!
engSearchText: Ugh!
jpnSearchText: ……くっ……！！

engChrName: How DARE you show me pity! I told you I don't want it—so hurry up and kill me!
engSearchText:
How DARE you show me pity! I told you I don't
want it—so hurry up and kill me!
jpnChrName: 情けでもかけようってのかい！？ 決着はついたんだ、とっとと殺しな！
jpnSearchText:
情けでもかけようってのかい！？
決着はついたんだ、とっとと殺しな！

engChrName: Agh!
engSearchText: Agh!
jpnChrName: ぐあっ……！
jpnSearchText: ぐあっ……！
な───！？

engChrName: Van!
engSearchText: Van!
jpnChrName: ヴァン……！！
jpnSearchText: ヴァン……！！

engChrName: V-Van! Are you okay?!
engSearchText: V-Van! Are you okay?!
jpnChrName: ヴァ、ヴァンさん……！ 大丈夫ですかっ！？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァ、ヴァンさん……！
大丈夫ですかっ！？

engChrName: ...Yeah. She missed my vitals. It'll heal soon enough.
engSearchText: ...Yeah. She missed my vitals. It'll heal soon enough.
jpnChrName: っ……ああ、急所は外した。 このくらいはカスリ傷だろう。
jpnSearchText:
っ……ああ、急所は外した。
このくらいはカスリ傷だろう。

engChrName: Oh, drop the tough-guy act, already! Why're you always treating your own body like it isn't worth shit?!
engSearchText:
Oh, drop the tough-guy act, already! Why're you
always treating your own body like it isn't worth shit?!
jpnChrName: んなワケあるか……！ 毎度毎度無茶してんじゃねえ！！
jpnSearchText:
んなワケあるか……！
毎度毎度無茶してんじゃねえ！！

engChrName: We'll heal you right away!
engSearchText: We'll heal you right away!
jpnChrName: すぐに治療しないと……！
jpnSearchText: すぐに治療しないと……！

engChrName: I'm on it!
engSearchText: I'm on it!
jpnChrName: 応急処置に入ります……！
jpnSearchText: 応急処置に入ります……！

engChrName: I'll help, too!
engSearchText: I'll help, too!
jpnChrName: 私もサポートするわ……！
jpnSearchText: 私もサポートするわ……！

engChrName: ...Why?
engSearchText: ...Why?
jpnChrName: ……なんでだい……？
jpnSearchText: ……なんでだい……？

engChrName: Why didn't you kill me? You could've struck me down easily from that distance!
engSearchText:
Why didn't you kill me? You could've struck me
down easily from that distance!
jpnChrName: 殺せる間合いだったはずだ…… なのに、どうしてそこまで……！
jpnSearchText:
殺せる間合いだったはずだ……
なのに、どうしてそこまで……！

engChrName: So do it! Finish me off! I lost, so hurry up and kill me!
engSearchText: So do it! Finish me off! I lost, so hurry up and kill me!
jpnChrName: 決着はついたんだ、とっとと殺しな！
jpnSearchText: 決着はついたんだ、とっとと殺しな！

engChrName: Sorry, but I'm turnin' down that request. It just ain't up to my standards.
engSearchText:
Sorry, but I'm turnin' down that request. It just ain't
up to my standards.
jpnChrName: ……そんな筋の通らねぇ依頼を 受けてやる義理はねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
……そんな筋の通らねぇ依頼を
受けてやる義理はねぇな。

engChrName: You got a lot of crimes to answer for, missy. Your group cooked up a real shitty plot, and y'all got a lot of innocent folks mixed up in it, too.
engSearchText:
You got a lot of crimes to answer for, missy.
Your group cooked up a real shitty plot, and y'all got
a lot of innocent folks mixed up in it, too.
jpnChrName: あれだけの事をやったアルマータの幹部── 関係のねえ人間まで大勢巻き込んでいる。
jpnSearchText:
あれだけの事をやったアルマータの幹部──
関係のねえ人間まで大勢巻き込んでいる。

engChrName: So I can't let you take the easy way out. Not my style.
engSearchText: So I can't let you take the easy way out. Not my style.
jpnChrName: そこまでの咎（とが）を一思いにチャラにしてやるのは 裏解決屋の流儀には反するんでな。
jpnSearchText:
そこまでの咎（とが）を一思いにチャラにしてやるのは
裏解決屋の流儀には反するんでな。

engChrName: Ugh!
engSearchText: Ugh!
jpnChrName: くッ……！
jpnSearchText: くッ……！

engChrName: I ain't got a shred of sympathy for you...
engSearchText: I ain't got a shred of sympathy for you...
jpnChrName: お前さんには同情はできそうにない。
jpnSearchText: お前さんには同情はできそうにない。

engChrName: ...but I do get that you had no one else to turn to back then.
engSearchText:
...but I do get that you had no one else to turn to
back then.
jpnChrName: ──だが、歪んじまった経緯を考えると 他に頼れるモンが無かったのも確かだろう。
jpnSearchText:
──だが、歪んじまった経緯を考えると
他に頼れるモンが無かったのも確かだろう。

engChrName: And that's what we're here for—to help people who have no one else in their corner.
engSearchText:
And that's what we're here for—to help people who
have no one else in their corner.
jpnChrName: そして本来、裏解決屋ってのは そんな連中のためにある仕事でな。
jpnSearchText:
そして本来、裏解決屋ってのは
そんな連中のためにある仕事でな。

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnSearchText: ……え…………

engChrName: I'd wager you're gonna be facin' the death penalty.
engSearchText: I'd wager you're gonna be facin' the death penalty.
jpnChrName: やらかしてきた事を考えると 極刑を喰らっても文句は言えねぇ筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
やらかしてきた事を考えると
極刑を喰らっても文句は言えねぇ筈だ。

engChrName: Though if you dodge that bullet and get outta the slammer, don't go to a piece of shit like Dantès if you're in trouble. Send out a 4SPG instead.
engSearchText:
Though if you dodge that bullet and get outta the
slammer, don't go to a piece of shit like Dantès if
you're in trouble. Send out a 4SPG instead.
jpnChrName: だがもし生き延びて……ジェラールみたいな野郎に 縋るくらいなら４ｓｐｇを出すのを勧めるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
だがもし生き延びて……ジェラールみたいな野郎に
縋るくらいなら４ｓｐｇを出すのを勧めるぜ。

engChrName: Can't guarantee we'll take it on—depends on the pay and whether it interests me. But I'll hear you out.
engSearchText:
Can't guarantee we'll take it on—depends on the pay
and whether it interests me. But I'll hear you out.
jpnChrName: 引き受けるかは報酬と筋が通るか次第だがな。
jpnSearchText: 引き受けるかは報酬と筋が通るか次第だがな。
…………………………………

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさん………
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァンさん………

engChrName: Haha... Ahahaha!
engSearchText: Haha... Ahahaha!
jpnChrName: ……クク……アハハハハ………
jpnSearchText: ……クク……アハハハハ………

engChrName: Hah... Wow. I just got beat by a crazy bastard with an even crazier profession. Pathetic.
engSearchText:
Hah... Wow. I just got beat by a crazy bastard with an
even crazier profession. Pathetic.
jpnChrName: ……何が裏解決屋だ…… そんな甘っちょろい裏稼業があってたまるかい……
jpnSearchText:
……何が裏解決屋だ……
そんな甘っちょろい裏稼業があってたまるかい……

engChrName: Where did my life go so wrong...?
engSearchText: Where did my life go so wrong...?
jpnChrName: ……なんで、こんなヤツらに………
jpnSearchText: ……なんで、こんなヤツらに………

engChrName: Well, that wasn't exactly the sweet and satisfying revenge I've been craving, but eh. It'll do.
engSearchText:
Well, that wasn't exactly the sweet and satisfying
revenge I've been craving, but eh. It'll do.
jpnChrName: ……ハン、仇討ちって意味じゃ ヌリぃ気もするが……
jpnSearchText:
……ハン、仇討ちって意味じゃ
ヌリぃ気もするが……

engChrName: Yeah. It could've ended a lot worse.
engSearchText: Yeah. It could've ended a lot worse.
jpnChrName: はい…… ですが落とし所、だと思います。
jpnSearchText:
はい……
ですが落とし所、だと思います。

engChrName: The upper zone boss Viola has been defeated. Zone clear. Round one complete.
engSearchText:
The upper zone boss Viola has been defeated.
Zone clear. Round one complete.
jpnChrName: 上層担当者ヴィオーラ　脱落 領域クリア　第１フェーズ終了
jpnSearchText:
上層担当者ヴィオーラ　脱落
領域クリア　第１フェーズ終了

engChrName: Ah!
engSearchText: Ah!
jpnSearchText: あ……

engChrName: The activation device!
engSearchText: The activation device!
jpnChrName: 起爆装置が……
jpnSearchText: 起爆装置が……

engChrName: Ahaha! Well done, well done! I believe some congratulations are in order!
engSearchText:
Ahaha! Well done, well done! I believe some
congratulations are in order!
jpnChrName: アハハ、無事クリアしたみたいだね！
jpnSearchText: アハハ、無事クリアしたみたいだね！

engChrName: Oho! Well, I certainly didn't see that end coming.
engSearchText: Oho! Well, I certainly didn't see that end coming.
jpnChrName: アハハ、まさかまさかの結末だねぇ？
jpnSearchText: アハハ、まさかまさかの結末だねぇ？

engChrName: The first boss of our little game was defeated by none other than...Team Arkride Solutions!
engSearchText:
The first boss of our little game was defeated by none
other than...Team Arkride Solutions!
jpnChrName: 上層担当者、ヴィオーラを破ったのは チーム『アークライド解決事務所』！
jpnSearchText:
上層担当者、ヴィオーラを破ったのは
チーム『アークライド解決事務所』！

engChrName: And with over ten minutes to spare, no less! An impressive feat, to be sure.
engSearchText:
And with over ten minutes to spare, no less!
An impressive feat, to be sure.
jpnChrName: タイムリミットまで１０分以上残して 無事に第一フェーズをクリアだ！
jpnSearchText:
タイムリミットまで１０分以上残して
無事に第一フェーズをクリアだ！

engChrName: I had the slightest suspicion you would be the ones to slay the 'fair maiden.' And what a beautiful massacre it was!
engSearchText:
I had the slightest suspicion you would be the ones to
slay the 'fair maiden.' And what a beautiful massacre
it was!
jpnChrName: いや～、きっと君たちだと思ってたよ。 さすがは僕らを何度も邪魔しただけはあるなぁ！
jpnSearchText:
いや～、きっと君たちだと思ってたよ。
さすがは僕らを何度も邪魔しただけはあるなぁ！

engChrName: ...Is what I would like to say, but you spared her pathetic life. And now she must live on in shame.
engSearchText:
...Is what I would like to say, but you spared her
pathetic life. And now she must live on in shame.
jpnChrName: それにしても、敵に情けをかけられて 無様に生き長らえるとはねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、敵に情けをかけられて
無様に生き長らえるとはねぇ！

engChrName: Fortunately for her, the boss is busy at the moment. Had he seen that miserable performance, she would've surely welcomed death's sweet embrace.
engSearchText:
Fortunately for her, the boss is busy at the moment.
Had he seen that miserable performance, she
would've surely welcomed death's sweet embrace.
jpnChrName: ちなみにボスは忙しくて見てもいなかったよ。 彼女にとってはラッキーってところかな？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにボスは忙しくて見てもいなかったよ。
彼女にとってはラッキーってところかな？

engChrName: You really are the lowest of the low!
engSearchText: You really are the lowest of the low!
jpnChrName: コイツ、どこまで……！
jpnSearchText: コイツ、どこまで……！

engChrName: Save your breath, Judith. Blowing a fuse over that mental nutcase is a clear waste of energy.
engSearchText:
Save your breath, Judith. Blowing a fuse over that
mental nutcase is a clear waste of energy.
jpnChrName: ……怒るだけムダだよ。 人として壊れてるんだから。
jpnSearchText:
……怒るだけムダだよ。
人として壊れてるんだから。

engChrName: Ahaha! Aww, why so angry? You're the undisputed winners of round one! You should be over the moon!
engSearchText:
Ahaha! Aww, why so angry? You're the undisputed
winners of round one! You should be over the moon!
jpnChrName: アハハ、クリアしたんだから もっと嬉しそうにすればいいのに。
jpnSearchText:
アハハ、クリアしたんだから
もっと嬉しそうにすればいいのに。

engChrName: Perhaps I should present you with a little reward for this momentous occasion. That ought to get you in a celebratory mood. ❤
engSearchText:
Perhaps I should present you with a little reward for
this momentous occasion. That ought to get you in a
celebratory mood. ❤
jpnChrName: 記念すべき初回だから “ご褒美”だって用意してるのにさ❤
jpnSearchText:
記念すべき初回だから
“ご褒美”だって用意してるのにさ❤

engChrName: A reward?
engSearchText: A reward?
jpnChrName: ご、ご褒美……？
jpnSearchText: ご、ご褒美……？

engChrName: Indeed. I shall answer one—and only one—question of your choosing.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I shall answer one—and only one—question
of your choosing.
jpnChrName: そう……何でも一つだけ 質問に答えてあげようと思ってね。
jpnSearchText:
そう……何でも一つだけ
質問に答えてあげようと思ってね。

engChrName: I can only imagine the number of questions that are swimming around in those little heads of yours.
engSearchText:
I can only imagine the number of questions that are
swimming around in those little heads of yours.
jpnChrName: 知りたい事はいくらでもあるだろう？
jpnSearchText: 知りたい事はいくらでもあるだろう？

engChrName: Tread carefully, though. The other teams are no doubt listening in on every word.
engSearchText:
Tread carefully, though. The other teams are no
doubt listening in on every word.
jpnChrName: ちなみにこの通信はいま全チームに 中継しているからそのつもりでね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにこの通信はいま全チームに
中継しているからそのつもりでね。

engChrName: There's one that's been naggin' me.
engSearchText: There's one that's been naggin' me.
jpnChrName: ……だったら一つ、 ちょうど聞きたかったことがある。
jpnSearchText:
……だったら一つ、
ちょうど聞きたかったことがある。

engChrName: Why'd you pick Oración as the venue for this game?
engSearchText: Why'd you pick Oración as the venue for this game?
jpnChrName: どうして、このオラシオンを ゲームの舞台に選んだ？
jpnSearchText:
どうして、このオラシオンを
ゲームの舞台に選んだ？

engChrName: Huh? That's all? What an utterly rudimentary question.
engSearchText:
Huh? That's all? What an utterly
rudimentary question.
jpnChrName: んー？　そんな事でいいのかい？
jpnSearchText: んー？　そんな事でいいのかい？

engChrName: This underground labyrinth is one reason. It's the quintessential playground for our game—the happiest of happy hunting grounds!
engSearchText:
This underground labyrinth is one reason.
It's the quintessential playground for our
game—the happiest of happy hunting grounds!
jpnChrName: その地下遺構の存在がちょうど 今回の“ゲーム”に適していたのと──
jpnSearchText:
その地下遺構の存在がちょうど
今回の“ゲーム”に適していたのと──

engChrName: It's also the home of some people we owe very much to. You may ask, 'But who could they be...?' Too bad I'm only answering one question!
engSearchText:
It's also the home of some people we owe very
much to. You may ask, 'But who could they be...?'
Too bad I'm only answering one question!
jpnChrName: 以前から世話になっている人たちがいる── とだけ言っておこうかな？
jpnSearchText:
以前から世話になっている人たちがいる──
とだけ言っておこうかな？
（……っ…………）

engChrName: Anyway, round two will begin tomorrow at 10AM. The remaining players will be invited once more.
engSearchText:
Anyway, round two will begin tomorrow at 10AM.
The remaining players will be invited once more.
jpnChrName: ──さて、第２フェーズの開始時刻は 明日の午前１０時になる。
jpnSearchText:
──さて、第２フェーズの開始時刻は
明日の午前１０時になる。

engChrName: Use your free time wisely, now. Preparedness is paramount to winning this game.
engSearchText:
Use your free time wisely, now. Preparedness is
paramount to winning this game.
jpnChrName: 今残ってる全チームに参加資格があるから 準備だけは進めておくことをお勧めするよ。
jpnSearchText:
今残ってる全チームに参加資格があるから
準備だけは進めておくことをお勧めするよ。

engChrName: And with that, I bid you adieu! ♪
engSearchText: And with that, I bid you adieu! ♪
jpnChrName: それじゃ、アデュー♪
jpnSearchText: それじゃ、アデュー♪

engChrName: The first day of the game came to a close.
engSearchText: The first day of the game came to a close.
jpnChrName: ──こうして、波乱続きの “ゲーム”の初日は幕を閉じた。
jpnSearchText:
──こうして、波乱続きの
“ゲーム”の初日は幕を閉じた。

engChrName: But before Van's group could bid farewell to their collaborators and exit the labyrinth...
engSearchText:
But before Van's group could bid farewell to their
collaborators and exit the labyrinth...
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちはいったん協力者と別れて 地上に戻ることになり……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちはいったん協力者と別れて
地上に戻ることになり……

engChrName: ...they had to decide what to do about Viola.
engSearchText: ...they had to decide what to do about Viola.
jpnChrName: ヴィオーラの身柄については、 ヴァンの判断に委ねられるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴィオーラの身柄については、
ヴァンの判断に委ねられるのだった。

engChrName: (She might be unconscious right now, but she's still an Almata exec. Someone needs to keep a watchful eye on her till this is over.)
engSearchText:
(She might be unconscious right now, but she's still
an Almata exec. Someone needs to keep a watchful
eye on her till this is over.)
jpnChrName: （無力化したとはいえアルマータの幹部……   ゲームが終わるまで拘束する必要があるだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（無力化したとはいえアルマータの幹部……
ゲームが終わるまで拘束する必要があるだろう。）

engChrName: (And that someone can't be us. Can't afford to split my team. I should hand her over to a group with more manpower...but who?)
engSearchText:
(And that someone can't be us. Can't afford to split
my team. I should hand her over to a group with
more manpower...but who?)
jpnChrName: （だが俺たちじゃ無理だ。   できればツテを頼りたいところだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（だが俺たちじゃ無理だ。
できればツテを頼りたいところだが……）

engChrName: ...Mind if we leave her with you guys?
engSearchText: ...Mind if we leave her with you guys?
jpnChrName: ……アンタらに頼めるか？
jpnSearchText: ……アンタらに頼めるか？

engChrName: Sure thing. We'll take her into our custody.
engSearchText: Sure thing. We'll take her into our custody.
jpnChrName: ん、責任を持って預からせてもらう。
jpnSearchText: ん、責任を持って預からせてもらう。

engChrName: We're a little short-staffed at the moment, but I'm sure we can lean on the CID a little.
engSearchText:
We're a little short-staffed at the moment, but I'm
sure we can lean on the CID a little.
jpnChrName: 正直人手不足だが、ＣＩＤあたりとも 連携して万全の体制を敷いてみよう。
jpnSearchText:
正直人手不足だが、ＣＩＤあたりとも
連携して万全の体制を敷いてみよう。

engChrName: Cool.
engSearchText: Cool.
jpnChrName: ああ、よろしく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、よろしく頼むぜ。

engChrName: ...Yes, of course.
engSearchText: ...Yes, of course.

engChrName: I think handin' her over to the guild is our best bet, even if they're short-staffed.
engSearchText:
I think handin' her over to the guild is our best bet,
even if they're short-staffed.
jpnChrName: ……ま、ここはギルドに 引き渡すのが無難だろう。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、ここはギルドに
引き渡すのが無難だろう。

engChrName: I'll give Elaine a call.
engSearchText: I'll give Elaine a call.
jpnChrName: あいつらも人手不足だろうが、 エレインたちに連絡してみねぇとな。
jpnSearchText:
あいつらも人手不足だろうが、
エレインたちに連絡してみねぇとな。

engChrName: Don't forget that Renne's there, too. She can help out if need be.
engSearchText:
Don't forget that Renne's there, too. She can help out
if need be.
jpnChrName: はい、レン先輩もいますし 上手く段取ってくれそうです。
jpnSearchText:
はい、レン先輩もいますし
上手く段取ってくれそうです。

engChrName: What a shame. And here I was, ready to pounce at the opportunity to interrogate her. Might you reconsider?
engSearchText:
What a shame. And here I was, ready to pounce at
the opportunity to interrogate her. Might
you reconsider?
jpnChrName: おや、それは残念ですねぇ。 黒月にとっても重要な参考人なのですが。
jpnSearchText:
おや、それは残念ですねぇ。
黒月にとっても重要な参考人なのですが。

engChrName: Yeah, no. If we left her in your hands, there's no tellin' what'd happen to her.
engSearchText:
Yeah, no. If we left her in your hands, there's no
tellin' what'd happen to her.
jpnChrName: ……アンタらに任したら どうなるか分からんからな。
jpnSearchText:
……アンタらに任したら
どうなるか分からんからな。

engChrName: It's thanks to their efforts that we won at all. I don't think you have room to object here.
engSearchText:
It's thanks to their efforts that we won at all. I don't
think you have room to object here.
jpnChrName: この結末を導いたのは彼らです。 ここは折れるべきかと。
jpnSearchText:
この結末を導いたのは彼らです。
ここは折れるべきかと。

engChrName: *sigh* Indeed. Truly a pity.
engSearchText: *sigh* Indeed. Truly a pity.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、銀殿がそうおっしゃるなら 仕方ありませんか。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、銀殿がそうおっしゃるなら
仕方ありませんか。

engChrName: ...Mind if we leave her with you guys?
engSearchText: ...Mind if we leave her with you guys?
jpnChrName: ……アンタらに頼めるか？

know they're a bit short-staffed right now.

over to the capital police when this is all over, or I'll
find someone else.

首都警察に引き渡すと約束しろ。

engChrName: Very well. I will do my best to adhere to that promise.

それまではこちらで預からせてもらいます。

may not be easy to convince the powers that be to
release her from our custody.

──まあ、聞き取りした内容次第では
簡単には引き渡せないかもしれませんが。

engSearchText: Those damn elders...
jpnChrName: ハッ、長老どもの意見もありそうだな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、長老どもの意見もありそうだな。

engChrName: But I will do everything within my power to ensure she is brought to the authorities when we are done. You have my word.
engSearchText:
But I will do everything within my power to ensure
she is brought to the authorities when we are done.
You have my word.
jpnChrName: ……私も可能な限り 見届けるようにするから。
jpnSearchText:
……私も可能な限り
見届けるようにするから。

engChrName: That's reassuring to hear, at least.
engSearchText: That's reassuring to hear, at least.
jpnChrName: ええ、よろしく頼んだわ。

engChrName: ...But why? Are you saying that you can't trust us with her?

...But why? Are you saying that you can't trust us
with her?

……ヴァン？
私たちが信用できないというの？

stretched thin.

jpnSearchText:

engChrName: I mean, you're not exactly wrong, but... Ugh.
engSearchText: I mean, you're not exactly wrong, but... Ugh.
jpnChrName: ……それは……
jpnSearchText: ……それは……

engChrName: *sigh* The truth hurts.
engSearchText: *sigh* The truth hurts.
jpnChrName: ふう、正直納得はできないけど。
jpnSearchText: ふう、正直納得はできないけど。

engChrName: Hate to admit it, but we do have a lot on our plate as it is.
engSearchText:
Hate to admit it, but we do have a lot on our plate as
it is.

jpnSearchText:
……地上の対応もあることを考えると
たしかに落とし所かもしれんな。

engSearchText:
Could you do us a solid and arrange for them to hand
her over to the capital police when all of this is over?

jpnSearchText:
ただしこの件が終わったら首都警察に

engChrName: That's the plan.
engSearchText: That's the plan.
jpnChrName: ああ、その辺は任せてくれ。

engChrName: I think handin' her over to the guild is our best bet, even if they're short-staffed.

engChrName: You, uh, sure that's a good idea?

jpnChrName: 黒月に……いいのかよ？

engChrName: I'm not keen on the idea, either, but the guild's stretched thin right now.

capital police when this is all over, though.
jpnChrName: ただしこの件が終わったら首都警察に 引き渡すように交渉するつもりだが。
jpnSearchText:
ただしこの件が終わったら首都警察に
引き渡すように交渉するつもりだが。

engChrName: It's hard to feel at ease when Heiyue is involved...but there aren't many other viable alternatives.
engSearchText:
It's hard to feel at ease when Heiyue is involved...but
there aren't many other viable alternatives.
jpnChrName: 正直、安心とは言い難いですけど…… たしかに落とし所かもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
正直、安心とは言い難いですけど……
たしかに落とし所かもしれませんね。

engChrName: At least Ri—I mean, Yin is with them. She'll stop them from going too far. Of that I'm certain.
engSearchText:
At least Ri—I mean, Yin is with them. She'll stop
them from going too far. Of that I'm certain.
jpnChrName: まあリー……《銀》もいる以上、 滅多なことはさせないでしょ。
jpnSearchText:
まあリー……《銀》もいる以上、
滅多なことはさせないでしょ。

engChrName: *sigh* And after going through all the trouble of beating her up...
engSearchText:
*sigh* And after going through all the trouble of
beating her up...

jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、折角の手柄だし

I'd love to take custody of her, but I'll let this one go.
You did risk your life to spare her, so it's only fair.

jpnSearchText:
君が身を挺して導いた以上、
ここは譲るべきかな？

engSearchText:
We cannot seize custody by force. Doing so would be
violating the shinobi code of honor.
jpnChrName: 確かに──強引に奪っては 侍衆の義に悖りましょう。
jpnSearchText:
確かに──強引に奪っては
侍衆の義に悖りましょう。

engChrName: Sweet. Thanks for bein' so chill about it. (Ah. So their client must be...)
engSearchText:
Sweet. Thanks for bein' so chill about it.
(Ah. So their client must be...)
jpnChrName: そうしてくれると助かるぜ。 （こいつらの雇い主はやはり……）
jpnSearchText:
そうしてくれると助かるぜ。
（こいつらの雇い主はやはり……）

engChrName: So you're sparing the wolf who has bared her teeth at you and your flock? How foolish.
engSearchText:
So you're sparing the wolf who has bared her teeth at
you and your flock? How foolish.

jpnSearchText: フフ、どちらにせよ甘ちゃんやねぇ。

engSearchText:
Perhaps we ought to save you from yourselves.
I hereby offer to send her to sleep with the fishes.

jpnSearchText:
やっぱ消した方がええんちゃう？
今なら代わりにやったげてもええんよ？

engChrName: Offer rejected. Keep your filthy paws to yourselves, both of you.
engSearchText:
Offer rejected. Keep your filthy paws to yourselves,
both of you.

少なくとも俺の目の前ではな。

Why, though? She's lost the will to go on, so she's as
good as dead, if you ask me.

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Whatever.

jpnChrName: ハッ……ご忠告ありがとうよ。

姫、“主契約”の方も

クク、今日も今日とて
